2a1(1): bu'i khyag pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/ drung na tshun rjes gcod cing bu 'am shing gi na la gso du
2a2(1): zhugs pa las ci tsam du khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo // des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / drang srong
2a3(1): go'u ta ma'i yin par gyon nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsdun bstod de/ 
2a4(1): de gnyis kyi ming btags pa nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ zhi ba'i 'od gzer gyis smin par byas pa los 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de
2b1(1): bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to// drang srong go 'u ta ma'i bu yin pas ming go ldata ma zhes bya bar gyur to// rang gi yan lag
2b2(1): lus skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes zhes bya bar gyur to// / bla ma shing gi tsha la gas pa nas rnyed pas med
2b3(1): bani zla rab shing ba zhes bya bar gyur / citsa mdus gzhan nigan zal po b.radwa
2b4(1): dza bu med par shrI nas/ blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes lnga
2b5(1): dag su nig rdul po dbang bskur bar du/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcin sa'u
2b6(1): drang srong rnamasanang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs brgyad
3a1(1): du 'ongs pa yin pas de ba dbang bskur ro// de nas de rnams kyi gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste/ seng ba dang rkang pa gnyis la
3a2(1): gtugs nas smras pa drang srong chen po go'u ta ma gang du mchis/ des smras pa khyed cag kho nas bsad do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong ba yang mi dran
3a3(1): na ji ltar bsad kho bos khyed cag la dran par bya'o// ma nongs so// des de rnams dran par byas pa dang smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgags
3a4(1): pa ma yin gyis gnog shig/ des sdig pa'i las ci byas 'di dang 'dra'o// skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gos bsad do// de ltar ci mngon des
3a5(1): ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po de ltar na des ma legs kyis bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so// zhes de nas
3a6(1): de skad du gtam smras par byed pa na khye'u de gnyis kyang drang ga srong gi drung du 'ongs so// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa de kho na'i
3a7(1): bu'o// de rnams kyis sbas pa/ 'di gnyis ci las skyes/ de gnyis kyi ming ni lags/ des blang ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa rjen po rnams kyis thos te mchog tu mtshar skyes nas// 
3b1(1): de rnams kyis drang srong de gsol ba btu nas/ de rnams la gnyis las gnon nu bu po cig shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de lang bu med par sha'o// de nas cig
3b2(1): shos nu bo dbang bskur nas/ de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing gi bu dang tsha bo dang yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing
3b3(1): pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'bigs skyes pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // go'u ta ma dag rgyal bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu
3b4(1): bA ni s+t+wa~M/ sgrar mda' gdong dang log rna dang glang po che 'dul dang rkang rngub can no// dus gzhan+da ni gan de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/ sems khongs su chud
3b5(1): cing 'dug go/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dges shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shin ci'i phyir sems khongs su
3b6(1): chung cing mo 'dug/ lbag la ted gyur ni gas rgyal bai rnam stsol bu ma mchis nas/  s+yAd du lnga'i btsun po mo dam pa mi ba~Mtsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gnyen na 'di dag ni rgyal srid
3b7(1): par 'ded pa'i phyir rgyal bu 'didag yin na/ ngal su nas bu ma mo bar 'gyur/ slang gong sa sa dang bdag cagagis bcal la/ de sa min rgyal ba gzhan gyi bum gzugs babang pa
4a1(1): bstan sdug pa mdzes pa brgyan ma dam par 'arnam pa yod pa de/ de rnams kyis btags te/ rgyal ba'i drung ngu dang nas de nas de rnams kyis gcig
4a2(1): nas gcig tu chud ras/ rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal bas bsgo ba khug shig de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas
4a3(1): bdug go// gautam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong na nas smras pa/ lha bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol/ rgyal
4a4(1): pe buM ra ma shing pa shi 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slong ngo // rgyal pos smras pa 'grab ring bab tsa pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang ngam zhig bca' ste/ 
4a5(1): gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na/ de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhag pa lta na sbyin no// lha bka' bzhin du 'tshal mchis na/ lha la snyan du gdas par gsol
4a6(1): lo zhes de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches pu por gyur pa/ rgyal srid la mngon par
4a7(1): dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jogs pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no/ lha don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te shog btsun mo blangs la/ lha de dang lhan cig rtsod mo dang dges pa dang
4b1(1): dga' mgur spyod pa mdzod cig de la rje'u bca' bar gyur ram/ 'on te mar 'gyur ram/ sprir ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dgagal te ltar na dang la
4b2(1): seng shig/ de rnams deng la bsus te/ di tsum na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ 
4b3(1): dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed dgu'i mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gnan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs
4b4(1): bzang ba bldan sdug pa mdzes pa zhig bcas so// bcas nas de'i bcas skyon rgya cher byas te/ khye'u de'i ming cir gdag so zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar
4b5(1): ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du/ khye'u ming rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do zhes bya ba nas/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du bskyed par
4b6(1): byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gad ma bzhin du'o/ de rgyal chab kyi rgyal srong la mra b+ha nag pa de'i nang po rgyal pos thos nas/ des de la po ca btang ste/ tshig rtsub mo dang bcas pa'i spring yog spring du/ da
4b7(1): kyis sngon las grangs shing dam sa pa ban ga pa byed da ldan nga /  s+yA ma thas na cid kyis mthang nga bcan 'grus kyi pa la banin pazang yin pa
6a1(1): smras shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na kun tse'i sgra thag na 'di su zhig 'dug/ blon po chen rnams kyis smras pa gnon nu rnams so// gal te de ltar rangs gzhon
6a2(1): nu rnams spangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa lta bzod par mdzod cig gzhon nu rnams spang bar gsol/ rgyal po smras pa de bzhin du bya'o zhes gcon du rnam
6a3(1): sdug par chad pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs smras pa lta ba la de de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig 'chin/ de ci nas kyang mi dag pa de ltar bka' stsal
6a4(1): pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chad par rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / de rnams ldan chas te/ zhag bdun grong khyer
6a5(1): gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyas so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha galo te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro// 
6a6(1): gal te de ldan sgo chad cig/ de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrod mthar gyis ri bo gang ri dang nye bar chu bo skyal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong srer skya'i bsti
6a7(1): gnas dang he cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i skyil po dag byas te/ gnas ri dgas cing gsad nas/ 'tsho ba byed cing dus gsum du drang
6a8(1): spangs ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong par byed do// lang tshe dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pa bri nang nang su bo seng gseng por zur
6b1(1): ji tsam dungs gzhan nig drang srong ser bu'i del bu mthong nas dris pa khyed cag ci'i phyir sna pa sad seng por gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag
6b2(1): sad lta buM 'dod chags kyis shin du nyen pas so// des sbas pa rang ridza~M gasring mo spongs la mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig
6b3(1): drang srong chen po bdag cag gse de lta bu bgyid rung nga / shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid spor ba rnams drang srong gi tshig ni chad pa yin no// snyam nas
6b4(1): 'dod pa'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' mgu ba skyes te/ mas dbyer gyi srid ma rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' masbyar spyod par byed do// 
6b5(1): de rnams dang de dag lhar cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' pa'i byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na// bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te
6b6(1): de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tshur mo na sgra yin pas drang srong sor sku sems rtse cig pa nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag
6b7(1): mthong zin gyis kho bo gan du 'brar// drang srong chen po ci'i phyir bsame gtan gyi tsher ram ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btubs pas so// 
8a1(1): skar mda' gdeng rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcud na/ de yang bu med par shi nas lag na rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu ya med par shi nas gleng chen
8a2(1): 'dul rgyal por gyur to/ de yang bu med par shi nas rkang rngu ba can rgyal por 'gyur ro// de'i bu gnas 'dzeg go/ go'u ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bus khyim mo/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa khyim gyi bu
8a3(1): dang chu bo dang yang cha deng sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lI khri lnga steng grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang
8a4(1): shing rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gnu rgyal dang gzhu kra dang gzhu brtan no// go'u tam dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gra dang
8a5(1): dang seng ge sgra'o// go'u ta ma dag 'dzam bu gling gi gzu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na seng ge 'gram mchog tu grags so/ go'u ta ma dag se ge 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ zas gtsang dang zas
8a6(1): dkar dang bre'o zas dang tshad med zas so// bu mo btsang ma dang dkar mo dang bre bo mo dang tshad med ma'o// zas gtsang la gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa dge'o// zas dkar la bu
8a7(1): gnyis te tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang shAkya'i rgyal po babang ldan no// dre'o zas la bu gnyis te ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o// tshad med zas la ba gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'/ 
8b1(1): bo dang lhas sbyin no// me'igatsang ma'i bu ni legs par rabasad do// dkar mo'i bu ri 'phreng ba can no/ bre bo ma'i ni bzang len no// tshad med mI ni dge 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra
8b2(1): gcan 'dzin yin te/ go'u tam dag mang pos bkur gyi rgyud tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin du rdzogs srid pa'i 'phreng ba rgyud chad skye bo'i 'khor ba bzad de/ de yang srid pa med de/ de nas bcom ldan
8b3(1): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal
8b4(1): gyi bu chen po leg so leg so// me'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa/ chos kyi gtam smras pa yang legs so// mo'u 'gal
8b5(1): gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te/ chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
8b6(1): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam 'tshengs shig gzung shig lhag shog/ de ci'i
8b7(1): phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams sngon gyi rigs chud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam na den dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas par tshangs spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te dge slong dag rigs kyi bu
9a1(1): dad pas rab tu byung bas/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing klog pa'i rigs so// de nas ser skya'i gzhing shAkya rnams bcom ldan
9a2(1): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas dong ngo // de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi
9a3(1): na rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste 'byor pa dang bde ba lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing
9a4(1): nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa 'bras bu dang bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa blta na sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lus bstar du rgyal po legs par
9a5(1): rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo dang mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar
9a6(1): gyur pa'i 'bras bu dang bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa
9a7(1): gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yul gyi bzang mo yulu bI ni zhes bya ba yod de/ lhas bstan na khyim bdag phug cing nor mang ba long skyed che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ 
9b1(1): rnams thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnams thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum chog
9b2(1): pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i de kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar
9b3(1): byed do// lu mAM nos de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes ste/ des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la gsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin// 
9b4(1): gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzung ba gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas rgyal po legs par rabasad kyis lu m+bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad du 'phags pa'i kun dga'
9b5(1): rab zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lum+bi na'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to/ rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung
9b6(1): snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ rgyal po legs par rabasad la yun ring po nas kye'ama'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa'i yod do// / 
9b7(1): citsam dus gzhan nig na de brkun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dras gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba
10a1(1): brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas pa
10a2(1): de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tsom du gyur nas/ 
10a3(1): ci 'di bu mo yan nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i spya 'phrul yin snyam mo// de btsas pa de'i btsas bston nyi ma bdun sum nyi shu rtsacig tu rgya cher byas nas/ bu me 'di'i mir
10a4(1): cir gdags shes mi 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong dus dang bzhi mdo'i dang gsum mdo rnams su
10a5(1): gleng ba kha cig gi mching nas ni/ 'di bu mo kho na lags te sngon gyi las kyi rnams par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mching
10a6(1): nas 'di bu mo ma lags kyi 'o na ci zhe na las sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/ de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes
10a7(1): btags so// bum smra 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen pa mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin dri'o// de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ mtshan/ 
10b1(1): phun sum tshogs pa/ du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod pa
10b2(1): byed par las bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig bcas so// de bcas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos
10b3(1): snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so// de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir
10b4(1): gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis sbas pa/ sgrar 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas/ de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya bar ming gdags so zhe
10b5(1): btags so// de yang skyed srings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la ma chen mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar
10b6(1): gyur te/ de ni 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes ston to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis zhig bcas pa ni
10b7(1): sgyu 'phrul ma dang sgyu 'phrul chen mo legs te/ de la gcig ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// 
11a1(1): zhes lung bstan to// cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor los bsgyur
11a2(1): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang zhed pa gzhon zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/ seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring kha gnyis ka yang gzho nu
11a3(1): le dgos pa mod kyi 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de yang
11a4(1): 'khor los bsgyur tezhes lung bstan pa de ni re shig 'dod do// gcig shos kyang 'tshogs brtag go// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bsgo'o// de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya ba seng zhes/ 
11a5(1): bya bar khrod pa dag cig yod ni/ shAkya rnams 'dras te/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skya ba seng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras
11a6(1): bshes ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lan cig g.yul spang bar mi nus so// lha gnon zas gtsang btang du gsol dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod
11a7(1): pa'i dam pa cig pa spangs pa de sbyin pa ltan btang ngo // de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yin lag bzhi
11b1(1): gzhon zas gtsang la sbar nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta'o// de nas shAkya rnams mgunas rgyal bu seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song ste/ lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa/ 
11b2(1): rnams/ bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang legs pas/ bdag cag blo ba dga' na gzhon nu mchog rtsi bzhed gsungs shig dpral lo shes ldan dag shAkya nas kyi khrims su bcas pa su ba
11b3(1): kyang mnyam pa las chung ma gzhag par mi bya'o// zhes byas so// lha ci khrims dral lam/ des smras pa lhag par shin tu bsam gyi/ dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam bcig
11b4(1): spong ba ni mnyam pa las chung ma blang ba yin no// lha rung gis de bzhin du dzod cig/ de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la po nya btang nas/ kho bos ni tshogs la brtags zin
11b5(1): gyis bu mo gcig shos kyang skri shig/ des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang sgri ste/ gzhon na zas gtsang gis gnyi ga blangs so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/ ser
11b6(1): sra'i gzhin rgyal zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang cod pa dang
11b7(1): 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa 'bras dang pu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pan bya gcig pa la sdug pa bzhi du rgyal ming myo/ rgyas gzhan nes na na ma gyu rgya
12a1(1): / chen mo dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do// 'di ni ches
12a2(1): nyid yin te byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na/ 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas rnam par gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzig
12a3(1): ba dang rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi
12a4(1): gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la de la res
12a5(1): 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rigs
12a6(1): ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blang lags so// zhes gzhi 'di ltas kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su cing mtshams sbyor bar bya'o snyam mo/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
12a7(1): thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub
12b1(1): sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad de ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhug/ 
12b2(1): pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras bu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa slongs mo pa
12b3(1): brgya 'du ba mtha' khob kyi skye bo med pa dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul gang yin par gzigs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / 'bras dang ba
12b4(1): yang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa slongs mo ba brgya 'du ba/ 'tha' khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis ma la bdag gis gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' khob
12b5(1): rnams su nying mtshams sbyor baspangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor bar blang bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med
12b6(1): pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bad bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis byang chub sems dpa'
12b7(1): nams yul la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgo/ 
13a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzam bu gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ban brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nyid
13a2(1): mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa brgya thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len te// byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi ro lo brgyad khri thub pa yang chad
13a3(1): ni mtshams sbyor nga mi len ce na/ mo rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid dbyung bar dga' zhing spro bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pas rnams
13a4(1): kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar 'grib pa la lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga'o// 'di lta ste tshe'i snyigs ma dang nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyig
13a5(1): ma dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam ma/ 
13a6(1): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' theg ma med pa nas spang bar mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med
13a7(1): pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa'adus le gzigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' myu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par med dad cen/ byang chub sems dpa' dag
13b1(1): ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig du nyid mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig brtson par bya zhing ma mes dang / 
13b2(1): pa mes bzung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med par gzigs nas/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bca bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste/ 
13b3(1): spyod pa la skyon med pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rgyu dngan pa la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so// zhes gni 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal
13b4(1): po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo // snyam mo// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing ba sogs pa dang / sangs
13b5(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa'i ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs pa mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
13b6(1): rgya gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi/ 
13b7(1): rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la/ rigs 'phel bar 'gyung zhing / sden/ 
14a1(1): gyi sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du
14a2(1): 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs ste sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes bzang po bdun gyi bar spyod pa la smon
14a3(1): med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / gang gi
14a4(1): don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pas bdag la gzhan
14a5(1): dag byang chub sems dpas mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas
14a6(1): smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bstsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud
14a7(1): med la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas/ 'dod na skyed pa'i lha'i ris drug la/ lan gsum du bsgrags pa grogs po dag lnga dga' ldan gyi lha'i
14b1(1): ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos te/ mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la/ de'i bur gyur te/ bdud rtsir rtogs par byas/ khyed cag las
14b2(1): gang dag bdud rtsi don du gcer bde ba la cher yul dbus kyi mi rnams su cing mtshams sbyor ba longs shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ byang chub seMs
14b3(1): dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig/ da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rung ba'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu gling ni rtog ge pa drug
14b4(1): dang rjes su sgrogs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis skyugs pa lags so// de la rtog ge pa drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byed dang kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang sgra 'dod kyi bu
14b5(1): mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu gnog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste bram ze rgyus rgal dang bram ze nas de ga dang / bram ze bzang ldan dang / 
14b6(1): bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o// snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dang / kun du rgyu
14b7(1): legs bzang dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can no// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham pa bgyi zhing bdag cag
14'a1(1): bslab pa'i bzhi rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa'i
14'a2(1): lam yan lag brgyad pa bris so// gong du ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so// brtsams par bya ning byung bar bya/ sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi
14'a3(1): bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// gang zhig rab tu bag yo bas// chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor lo rab spangs pas// sdug bsngal tha marabyed par 'gyur// zhes bris
14'a4(1): sing+ga la'i rgyal po la bka' yig spring ba// ras bal rimo bris pa/ ngas mu tig can la bskyes bkur ba yin gyis/ khyed kyis de la sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar/ sid la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye
14'a5(1): de'i tshogs sdus la bkur bsti chen pos ras 'di khom shig/ tshong ba de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mu tig can 'di yin zhes 'dren/ 'din bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yin
14'a6(1): na zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te 'gam 'di mi len 'dzin/ 'di gni gsu pa skabs su 'gro ba dang / bsu' pa'i gzhi ldarnams dang grags dang mthun pa grags dadu mi mthun pa'i na cing 'brel
14'a7(1): par 'byung ba/ 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o// 'dini bdud kyi rtags pa'i 'a 'gas pa'i lam yan lam brgyang pa yin na zhes brjodad par bya'o// pal to gang ma 'di ci yi nas 'dzin snga bar bya/ 
14'b1(1): yin te/ gang ni ga sbubs su 'gru ba dang / bsrub pa'i bani rnams zas te/ lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'i brel bar 'brang ba 'di la rtag cing bcan 'grus
14'b2(1): brtsam bde bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i ba'aphags pa'i lamatho nas sbrul bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no// zhes brjod par bya'o// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshang ba rnams
14'b3(1): kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin snga nas dong ngo // de nas dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ zong khyer nas sing+ga la'i gling du song ste/ 
14'b4(1): rims gyis sing+ga la'i gling du phyin nas lam gyis du bangal song ste/ rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te yi ge byin no// rgyal pos yi ge bklags te/ klags nas grong khyer de
14'b5(1): rde ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo bsal nas tsan dan gyi nus chag chag btab/ rgyal mtshan dang pa dan bsgreng / dar gyi rlan 'brang mang po btags shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs
14'b6(1): bkram ste si la'i gling na gnas pa'i slo ba'i tshogs bsags pa/ de nas pakar sa chen po byas te/ zeng khyer gyi dbus sa rin pa che sna bzhi las byas pa'i snyi'iskye ba'i khrib shams
14'b7(1): ras bre ba dang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phrag 'tshal lo// zhes gaspangs bsnyed de sbas so// de nas rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can dang drag pas dang
15a1(1): 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas la byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas/ chos bshad de chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag
15a2(1): gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de la de ltar bsgrub par bgyi bar sems legs so/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lhan rnams la/ 
15a3(1): 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag de'i phyi rol mo'i pa tsha byad thams cad brdungs zhing / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems
15a4(1): dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ grogs pa dga'adi la sgra lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so/ grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'icha spyad thams cad zil gyis mnan
15a5(1): te gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas/ bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/ bdud
15a6(1): rjes 'gro ba tshim par bya'o// mi cig pa'i dung bud par bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o// bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o zhes sbas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 
15a7(1): seng ge ga ciganyis pa can pan chogs ring mi 'dems/ de rje ga cig gis bres ga ci la du ma 'jig ngam tsun gcig gis lA ma yin dbang rngam 'dams/ cim gcigagis mun pa dri ma ram/ 
15b1(1): par sel/ grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gcer ba de/ yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu cing mtshams sbyor ba longs shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
15b2(1): 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nyi mtshams sbyor la/ len par bzhed kyis/ mal bdag gis de la gzi
15b3(1): brjid bsgrub par bgyi'o// lhums nas bskyang bar bya'o// snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la bzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar
15b4(1): byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa ni spyod pa'i lha rigs drug la lan gsum du sbags nas/ nam gyi/ 
15b5(1): gung thun la glang po cher bstan te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so/ smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam pa bzhes// lha rnams la bsgo de nas shaM 'phros te/ 
15b6(1): nang par sprin rum ci ma gsar char ltar// de ni bu ram shing pa'i lhums su zhugs// 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rmi lam bzhi rmos pa// glang po chen dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig/ bdag
15b7(1): garje mjal nas nubs pa dang / sring gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang // ri brag chen po la 'dzegs pa dang / bdag la sgo bo'i tshogs chen po phrag byed pa'o des zas gtsang la sbas pa dang / rgyal pos/ 
16a1(1): blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rmi lam gsod kha na dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khugs shig/ de dag gis rmi lam gsod kha na dang mtshan
16a2(1): mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos de nas la rmi lam bsnyed pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar yang lngar bab pa dang / spyan na sras skyes bu
16a3(1): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig lham par gyur te/ gal te khyim na gnas par 'gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos
16a4(1): ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyims nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig
16a5(1): rten du sgra rnams par grags par 'gyur ro// bar sdom la/ 'chi pho lha dang rin po che/ rur brgyad rung dang btul zhugs stan/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i
16a6(1): ris nas shi 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshes chen po 'di shin du g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing / 'jig rten nas
16a7(1): 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mum pa mun nig smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang brlab 'di lta bu rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu' che ba dag gos kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang / de'i tshe sna ba
16b1(1): rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to// der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa bskyang ba yang mi mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ 
16b2(1): shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// zhes bya bar shes so// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe// 
16b3(1): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la ma'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'che bar mi 'gyur bar la'i bu bzhi yum gyi srung mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung dang / lag na mdung
16b4(1): thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa ni mdzod kyi nang na du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang / 
16b5(1): khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma 'bags so// dpe ra na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gros pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi dgos pa de
16b6(1): bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yul gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas gzhag pa na bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba yang rung
16b7(1): rub sna tshogs kyis ma 'bags so// chos kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas/ 
17a1(1): bzhugs pa mthong ngo // dper na nor bu bai DUr+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po rigs dang ldan pa dang gsal ba/ dri ma med pa mtshon skud sna lnga/ sngon po dang / ser
17a2(1): po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan la brgyus pa/ de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/ 'di ni skud pa'o// 'di ni nor bu'o// skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin
17a3(1): dubyang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bzhugs pa mthong ngo // chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe
17a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas/ lus dub par 'gyur ba med do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe// 
17a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum de phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi lnga blang bar gyur te/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du srog gcod pa spang
17a6(1): te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/ ma byin par len pa dang mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smras pa dang / sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ 
17a7(1): sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar bzlog par byed de/ srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang // brdzun mi smra dang chang la mi skam dang // khrig pa ma rang
17b1(1): spyod pa spongs pa 'di// 'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldam 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum 'di lta ste/ skyes
17b2(1): pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtong ba med do/ nyon mongs pa rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di ni 'dod rgyas sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ de yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i
17b3(1): skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtong pa med/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyed pa na kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chub tung ngo snyam nas/ des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas
17b4(1): gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skye/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis skra brgyan
17b5(1): pa zhig bltam par gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho mtha' dag 'thun par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan to rgyal pos smras pa gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blung na cir 'gyur/ sras yan lag
17b6(1): ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ nga ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin kun du rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul byang
17b7(1): ba zhig 'dug pa de/ rgyal pos bkug nas bsgo ba dang / des de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gni na 'dug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bstan te/ chu blud pa dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// / 
18a1(1): @/ gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma btson pa thams cad thar bar bya'o snyam pa dang // rgyal pos btson thams cad thar bar byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa
18a2(1): skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma sbyin pa dag byin bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin bsod nams dag byas nas/ 
18a3(1): de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa kye ma bdag gis skyed mos tshal bstan nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// 
18a4(1): gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa kye ma bdag skyed mos tshal du 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal po legs par rab gisad la lu mI ni'i tshal zhes bya'i skyed mos tshal yod nas/ de la rgyal po zu
18a5(1): gtsang gis spring ba/ khyod kyi bu mo skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar 'dod kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byos shig/ des zhos shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag sred mos tshal byi dor byos shig
18a6(1): de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa dang / de nas de 'khor rnams dang lhan cigadong ngo // de nas lum+bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa na shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin du rgyas pa zhig mthong ngo // / 
18a7(1): de nas bltam par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskoran
18b1(1): bltam mi phod kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ des rlung dang char pa tshar ragacig sbal nas/ des skye bo'i tshogs de kun dros so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid ma/ 
18b2(1): ma rgan mo'i tshad byed du/ mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / des bltam par btsems so// byang chub sems dpa' bltam par dang / brgya byin gyis pags pa'i
18b3(1): slebs mos bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgos te/ brgya byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so zhes dregs par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas bdag nyid rdo rjer byin
18b4(1): gyis brlabs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka thong shig thong shig/ par song shig/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub
18b5(1): sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di ga yos par gyur ces bya ba nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang
18b6(1): 'dir skyes so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// / 'dul ba ni// / dum bu bzhi pa// / ba po brgyad cu rtsa gzhi pa// 
18b7(1): ches nod kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas/ bltam pa na/ ral gri shubs nas blang ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dre ma dang / khrag gadri ma dang / 
19a1(1): mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis mi gos so// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa'i
19a2(1): tshe de'i yum mi dub mi 'al te/ 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam byed do/ chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ba ltam pa'i mad la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzig
19a3(1): nas gom pa bdun bdun dor zhing tshig tu yang gsung ba 'di ni shar phyogs yin te/ mya ngan 'das pa'i thog mar 'gro bar bya'o// 'di ni lho phyogs yin te 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o// 
19a4(1): 'di ni nub phyogs yin te nga'i skye ba'i mtha' ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro// 'di ni byang phyogs yin te/ srid pa'i mtsho las rgal bar bya'o// de'i dbu'i sted nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang / rnga
19a5(1): yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin te// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i tshe med la bar snang las chu bsil ba cig dang chu dron po cig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab
19a6(1): cing des byang chub sems dpa' la 'khrus mdzad do/ chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po 'byung nas 'bab par gyur te/ de la de'i yum
19a7(1): chus chu'i bya ba byed do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i maud la/ lhas bar snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi bye ma
19b1(1): dang / tsan dar gyi bre ma dang / ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro// lha'i me tog man+ta ras kyang 'thor ro// lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to// gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do// bar sdom la/ bltam dang bzhengs dang
19b2(1): gom pa bdun/ chu rgyun gcis dang chu mig lha/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe/ rgyal po bzhi'i yang bu bcas te/ mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis phur rangs sbyin
19b3(1): gyi bu bcas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu bcas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar btags so// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal ba
19b4(1): pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar btag so// 
19b5(1): ko sha mI na rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu bcas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba bzhin snang bar gyur pas 'di'i mang shar ba zhes bya bar btags so// grong khyer 'phag
19b6(1): rgyal du po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu bcas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron ma snang ba lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar btags so// de ni de lA ma yin no// 'on/ 
19b7(1): kyang de thams dpa cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no// ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/ de'i tshe bo ni mos byin
20a1(1): des de la dus dus dus 'jig pa'i gtam dang chags pa'i gtam smras pas/ de de las rab tu byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam/ 
20a2(1): pa na 'jog rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to// de'i tshems sngon phug tu zhugs te/ bsam gtan byed pa nas des snang bde mthong nas nyon mongs med la smras pa mkhan pa/ 
20a3(1): 'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag/ cig car byung bar gyur tam ci// ji ltar ri ni phug bcas pa// 'di na 'od kyis gsal bar gyur// nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa// nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du no// / 
20a4(1): bu cig snang ba 'di dag ni/ gA yan lag reg na 'od bsil bas// nges par thub pa de'i 'od// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen no/ nges par lhums nas bltam gyur la// bltam nas sems dpa'
20a5(1): chen po de'i// 'od gzer ba dang 'dra ba ni// dri ma med pa 'di dag gis// 'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas// mos sbyin gyis smras pa// mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' ltar mchi'o// 
20a6(1): des smras pa/ bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs pas gang yang bdag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod do// gang gi tshe byang chub sems
20a7(1): dpa'a'i bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnar byon pa nas/ de'i mang 'dogs pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag ngal ba'i prok+ka 'dong ngo // gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de/ 
20b1(1): nyid kyi nyi ma kho na las rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim gro pa rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang / rim gro pa rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya bcas so// bal gyi glang po chen lnga brgya
20b2(1): dang rta rgong ma lnga brgya yang 'brangs so// gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo // khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang das+tha phul te/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la ji ltar gyur pa slu
20b3(1): pa dang / rgyal pos bsams pa bdag gi bu bcas pa ni don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes btags so zhes de na/ 
20b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/ 'di lta ste don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig nyug mar gnas sa/ shAkya
20b5(1): rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u 'am/ bu mo bcas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshol du gzhug pa'i phyir khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po
20b6(1): rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la nyan nas rin
20b7(1): po chen sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' banag nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ ser skya'i bzhi'i shAkya gtum po gzu lums can/ 
21a1(1): /  kya rtsub btsum pa med pa rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na/ thub pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas
21a2(1): gtsang gis bsams pa sor skya'i gzhi shAkya 'di rnams ni gtum po gzu lums can/ btsum pa med pa yin na/ gzhon nu nang du zhugs pa na/ thub pa bzhin du gnas pas gnon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa
21a3(1): zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa btags pa 'di lta ste/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel
21a4(1): gyis byang chub sams dpa' mar gnyis pa ba tags pa 'dra lA sA/ shAkya thab pa zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' gnad spyan shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dang nya bzhag ta byin pa dang / gnad spun shAkya 'phacha
21a5(1): gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa blong ngo / mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal ba
21a6(1): zas gcang la sbas pa lnga gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nabs gnyis lag tugs lags so// rgyal pos thos nas sbas pa/ shes ldan dag lhas kyang bzhin na
21a7(1): gang pa gnyis la gtugs pas/ yidan lnga'i mang ma yin pas de byas nam nin nu'i mang lnga'i yang lhams padags sa zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum par tegs pa'idams 'i
21b1(1): swa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' nga lham pa'i mod la yang dang yum gyi sa ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khrod kyi gnon nu dus dus su skum tsho byos shig/ dus dus su khrus byos shig/ dus
21b2(1): sa dus su zas byin cig/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bden pas bsnyen bkur byos shig/ ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas/ dus dus su sku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus du
21b3(1): su sbyinaHdus dus su yang dag pa'i bden pas bsnyen bkur byed do// yang de'i ni dri shin du yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas
21b4(1): gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te/ pang du gzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis
21b5(1): mtshan mkhan dang lhas mkhan gyis bram ze de rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas shes ldan dag ci gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no// gal te khyim na
21b6(1): gnas par gyur na 'khor ldes sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun dang lnga ni 'di lta bu dag byung ste/ 
21b7(1): 'di las 'khor le rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / na rin po chen dang / ner bdun po che dang / thun med rin po che dang / khyim bdag ri na zin che dang / bdun pa ni blo po rin po che'o// bud pa' la ba brtul
21'a1(1): thod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa/ de rgya mtshol 'brug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnor par/ 
21'a2(1): sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa/ 'di nyid 'chad pa med cing mtshon kyis 'da' ba med la/ chos dang mthun pas legs par pa ba ste// gnas par 'gyur ro// gal
21'a3(1): teskra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes
21'a4(1): bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan no// shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes za chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur ba'i gzhan du ni ma
21'a5(1): yin no zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang dag yin// lha gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas
21'a6(1): pa lags so// zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mjam par 'bab ste/ lha 'di ni gnon nu'i skyes pa chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// de'i zhabs
21'a7(1): tsha'abral gyings gnasal 'khor mo lngangs snang rje ba dang ma lung dums brnam bathams graspangs su rdzogs pa ches so 'a dzinan nagyi rtses thunan pa munan legs so
21'b1(1): lha ga non du ni mo dring ba dang / zhabs kyi garjo pa yangs po dang / de phrag dang nabs lajam zhing gnon sha chags pa lags te/ brag dang nabs 'jam ning gnon
21'b2(1): chags pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi'ang ba ma panar ro// lha 'di na gnon nu'i skyes du chen po'i byan po'i mngan lags so/ lcuganon nan drug dang na pas drabs 'brel pa 'azhes
21'b3(1): de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ni/ dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhor nu bzhin no// lha 'di ni gnon nu'i skye zla chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gnon
21'b4(1): nu'i zhabs long bra'i tshigs la mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dgas e na mra'i lta bu dang sgra mdud pa dang / sku banongs bzhin du mdud par phyag pus mo'i lhang gnyis su
21'b5(1): slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha 'di ni gnon nu'i skyes za chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan legs so// lha gzhon nu ni mngoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i
21'b6(1): mngoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/ dper na glang po che cang shes kyi 'am/ rta cang shes kyi byung ma thag gi bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i ma
21'b7(1): lags so// lha gzhon nu 'i sku ni ji srid par 'dom yang de srid la 'dom ji srid par yang sku yang de srid pas shing n+ya grong ldar chu zhing gab pa lags te/ lha 'di ni
22a1(1): gzhon nu'i skyes pa chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i skar stod kyi thar ro nas skye ning de'i skul spu re re nas skye ba yang mthing ka la g.yas
22a2(1): zlogs sul khrel bar skyes lags// 'di na gnon nu'i sgras canan po mtsha migs sa/ dz+nyAn ma nu ma mngon gse dru ba dang / 
22a3(1): 'od 'dom gang ba dang lpags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba lags te/ lpags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sbal mi gos pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes
22a4(1): ze chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i sku ni mdun mtho ba ste/ sku mdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang zhabs
22a5(1): gnyis dang dpung mgo gnyis dang lhag pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gnon nu skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lga gzhon
22a6(1): nu'i thal gong rgyas pa dang skra seng ge 'dra ba dang sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhin bcu
22a7(1): mnga' ba dang chems mnyam pa dang / rnams thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar ba dang / 'igram pa seng ge 'dra ba dang / 
22b1(1): ro'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ 'di mi gnon nu'i skyes pa rnon po'i skyes brachen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gnon nu'i ljags shin tu ring zhing
22b2(1): srab pa lags te/ ljags shin tu ring ba dang srab pad+ma nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyung bas sgra mtshams na bzung ste nal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog
22b3(1): par mdzad pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes pa chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bingad kA'i skad ltar yid
22b4(1): du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha 'di ni gnon nu'i skyes pa chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lce gzhon nu'i spyan mthon b+h+ring la/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang dbu
22b5(1): gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smin marnams kyi mdzod sgra drang ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil pa legs te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags
22b6(1): so// lha 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
22b7(1): gyi skyes bu chen po ri mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so// gal te gzhon nu rab tu mabyung bar gyur ma/ 'khor los 'gyur ba ri rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du go chos nyid kyis byang chub sem dpa'
23a1(1): ma nas pa brnyan mnu pa dang / dusmra pa'i kum nangs par gyuraH/ nangs mthag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lham rdzas byarnam par snabar
23a2(1): gyur to// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das la lha'i kha dog thob pa skyes
23a3(1): pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba thob ste/ dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la ma gar ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs pa/ la ba
23a4(1): dkar pos sar pa'i steng du gzhag na shin du gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'che ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na
23a5(1): sdug ba ma'i kha dog las 'das shing / lha'i kha dog thob pa yin no// chos nyid kyis byang sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang yid
23a6(1): du 'ong bar gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs chen po de phrag pa nas phrag par sbed pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad+ma'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs
23a7(1): chen po de lag pa nas lag par chud par byed pa de de bzhin du snga ma bzhin no// bar sdom la/ mig mi 'dzums dang rnam par srin// gsung sman 'joms pa mkhas
23b1(1): pas sdus// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la blta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum cu
23b2(1): rtsa sum gyi lha rnams bzhin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas sngon gyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas des
23b3(1): na de nyin mtshan du dpag chad gcig kho ra khor yug du gzigs so// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'joms pa dang
23b4(1): gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'joms pa dang / skar snyan pa dang yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems
23b5(1): dpa' bltam pa'i mong nas snyan cing 'joms pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' blta ma
23b6(1): pa'i mang nas mkhas pa gusal bar yid blangs pa rgyud las byung ba'i shes rab sbed pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i tshod la
23b7(1): 'dus nas ngan bab ma'i tshig dang mi ge dag shes rab kyis so sar 'byed do// de nas mas zin gyis sbas pa/ mkhan pa byang chub sems dpa' ser
24a1(1): gzhir byon nas/ de'i rje mtshan gsum btags kyis ngani byang chub sems dpa' la bal ba 'phyir bcu dang // des smras pa
24a2(1): dAnan D+yan nas de gnas mas pa dang / zung chub sems dpa'i 'bras rdzu 'phrul nyams nas rkang pa kha nas zong ster sna'i gzhir zhugs nas rgyal ba zas
24a3(1): gi khyim gyi skur gson pa dang / drang skyong nyon mongs med kyis/ sgra spangs kyi me la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po zas gcad la drang srong nyon mongs med
24a4(1): lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so// gsol cig/ de song nas rgyal po sa rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes
24a5(1): ldan nyon mo snyed la su zhig 'gog nang du zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang gi sa bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod yon sbreng ba mchod nas/ stan
24a6(1): blta bas te 'dug pa dang rgyal po zas gcang gis bshes pa'i dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs des smras pa/ rgyal
24a7(1): chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa// khyad kyi mas ni mthang bar 'tshal// 'jog rten btso ba rnams 'dzin pa// thum pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal// rgyal bas
24b1(1): smras pa gal te de ltar gzhon nyal gyis ma sad kyi bar du re shig sdod cig/ des smras pa/ lta ba rnal ba nyid blta'o de bzhin gyis shig/ des ji tsam na byang
24b2(1): chub sems dpa' mig ni btsums shing mig mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la blta bar mthong nas/ des tshigs su bcad smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i
24b3(1): rta rnams ni// mtshan mo'i bzhi ca nyal ba ltar// dgos pa don gnyer rnams kyi nyid// mig la yun ring gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i
24b4(1): mod nas ma mas pang du blangs nas drang srong la byin pa dang drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras pa/ lha gzhon
24b5(1): mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la bstan pa lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa bstan to// de rnams kyis ji skad lung bstan 'khor los sbyar ba'i
24b6(1): rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang
24b7(1): chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdagacig pa pa rnams grol zul te/ btsud pa'i dus na 'khor los sur mi 'byung // khriso / 
25a1(1): @#rnams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni// nyes las rnam par rgyus 'gyur/ mtshan mi gsal ba dang ldan mi dbang po/ gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/ 
25a2(1): grub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/ mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur// zhes smra nas/ bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha' dang byang chub sems dpa' mongs par byang chub la brdag
25a3(1): par zhugs pa dang / byang chub sem dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu zhes nas khab nas byung nas nas/ lo drug dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te/ de nas bdun rtsi'i rtogs par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // bar skabs
25a4(1): der shi ba'i des byed par mthong nas de'i mig mche mas gang ste 'dug/ rgyal po zas gtsang gAs mthang nas sdangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis gang mthob pa/ 
25a5(1): ngoms par mi 'gyur ba// lus bzang dge byed de ni 'di mthong nas// drang srong chen po ji skad du bzhin gyur// ga las bdag gis gzhon 'jig pa 'am// tshe zang 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas gang // 
25a6(1): de ni myur du legs par bdag la smos// khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'angar gyur// drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 
25a7(1): gal te 'di'i steng du nam mkha' las/ rdo rje'i ser drug 'phangs pa 'a gyur kyang / thub pa chen po'i sku la ba sU ni/ nag ma cig
25b1(1): kyang g.yos par mi nus so// mechen rlung ni shrangs kyis 'das dpa/ mtshon nan ma shin tu me bzang dang drag po'i dug dang stsal
25b2(1): gyi dug rnon yang / gnonu la dang srang cig 'jig po'i pa 'gyur// thugs rje nyid la gnas 'gyur gang lags pa/ 'jigs pas
25b3(1): mnyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs sbru la// de na 'jigs pa ka thung 'joms pa na// mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la byung // 
25b4(1): 'jig rten na ni bdas nyid chernams kyi/ gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/ tshangs bcas lnga yang rngag du srung byed pa/ mi dbang de la 'jigs
25b5(1): pag la byung // mi dbang bdag gi rgung pa mthong nas ni// rang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob 'dag du mid// chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrang nas rnams/ don ma thob par bdag ni
25b6(1): 'chi bar 'gyur// gang dag smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med pa// 'di'i chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang // rab tu pha rol 'gyur rnams de bsring cing // bsod nams ldan la rim nang
25b7(1): bal// drang srong song mongs med rgyud pon mongs med pa can gyis 'ams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus bdag gi rje 'phrul nyams te// gal te bdag rkang gis sod nas
26a1(1): za'i tshogs chen po dang rgyal ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro// sam du rig nas sbas pa/ lha khyod yun ring po nas kye ma'o drang srang nyon mongs med rkang kho nas ser
26a2(1): swa'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung skam dgongs pa skyes pa/ bdag gi rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir zhugs te da ni rkang kho nas phyir 'byung gyis khyod kyis lam bstar ba dang / 
26a3(1): grong khyer byi dor bgyid du gsol cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgos pa/ shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer bI dor dang lam sbyor du chu ga cig/ lam po che
26a4(1): dang mchong 'dus dang bzhi mdor rad sum mdo rnams su drang srong nyon mongs med/ sa med rkang med gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gi bya ba dang byed pa yin pa de
26a5(1): ngag byos shig ces dril spogs shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'chal lo zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer gser s+ye'i gzhi rdo ba seg ma dang / gyo mo rnams
26a6(1): bsal nas can dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar gzhag/ dar gyi chun phyang po dpyangs rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgrengs nas/ lam po che dang
26a7(1): tshong 'dus dang / bani mdo dang sam mdo dang de rnams su zil sgrog tu chug pa/ ser sna'i gna'i shAkya shes ldan dag nyon cig drang srong nyon mongs med grong khyer ser sna'i ga ni
26b1(1): nas phyir byung gis/ khyed cag gi bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de byos shig/ de nas de nyon mongs pa'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal po zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs kyis
26b2(1): yongs su bskor ba/ ser skya na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag du ma rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi dbus nas dbus su byung ste/ grong
26b3(1): khyer ser sna'i sgor byung nas/ rgyal po slar bzlog ste/ ji ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin tu phyin pa dang / de de la 'jigs nas phan
26b4(1): chu na nyul zhing bltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs zhig tu 'dug go// de nas de lam gyis dub pa ngal sos te/ bsam gtan bskyed nas/ rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed
26b5(1): do/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nA drang srong nyon mongs ma nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur nas/ 'on kyang
26b6(1): phyir thu bar gyur to// de nas mi de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas sbas pa/ mkhan po khwa cag cung zad rab tu byung ba thams cad ni bdud rtsi'i ched dang bdud rtsigs la
26b7(1): ba'i phyir lags na/ gal te khan pos bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na/ bdud rtsi de las bdag cag la yang bgos shig/ des smras pa bram ze'i khye'u kho bo yang cung zad rab
27a1(1): / rba byung gathams cad ni bdud rtsi'i rlud dang bad+mad rtsi btsal ba'i phyir yin na kho zos kyang ma rtogs so// de lta mod kyi \u0f7f rnams kyi nang du byung ba
27a2(1): gnon gang ldan pa ras bdud rtsi rtogs par bar 'gyur ning bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba 'jom par byed par 'gyur gyis nga'i drung rngu rab tu byung shig/ khyod rab du byung nas rim
27a3(1): brjod par mi bya/ rus brjod pa mi bya/ bram ze'i khye'u brjod par mi bya ste/ rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing bdud rtsi rtogs par
27a4(1): par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o// de nas khyod kyis bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na
27a5(1): shar gyi phyogs su khyod 'dug dang // yang dag sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// brnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur// bsags pa kun gyi mtha' bzad cing / mthon po
27a6(1): rnams ni mtha' ltung 'gyur// 'phrad pa'i mtha' ni bral ba ste/ gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin// zhes smras te/ dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas mis
27a7(1): byin gyis rlabs kyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas lA raN sir song ste gnas so// de de la zam ze'i khye'u lnga brgyal bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jun
27b1(1): mas can tsa pang+ka/ tu man yin pas ra'i ming rgya ma na'i thug tu mthu nas zla bar d+harato// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa na sman
27b2(1): sngar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis ka t+ya'i bu de la gdams ngag phog nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/ shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang
27b3(1): bde ba mya ngan las 'das par 'jog par 'gyur te/ de'i ming ni ka t+ya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs
27b4(1): nas ring po ma lon bar ma ma'i pang du zhugs nas gser gyi nong par 'bras dang shar sres pa'i chan gsol pa ni/ de ma ma sa bkag kyang ma thub par mang por
27b5(1): gsol nas/ 'phrog par brtsams pa dang / 'phrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig gis 'phrog par
27b6(1): brtsams pa dang / des ts+tsha d+ha ma nus sa// de nas N+Dal pos thun po rnams dang ser stan gnas pa'i sde na'i tshig sna rnams la skyon de rnams kyis 'jug
27b7(1): ma nus sa// de nas blang pa chen lnga brgyal btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsams pa'i ni rnams kyis bdag gi spobs nyams ma ma
28a1(1): na kun shA du sa ma sam rnamam bsgragapas nas
28a2(1): bzung nas drangs pa dang / zang po che lnga brgya po de dag la phyir bsgyur te drangs nas/ de dag gis kyang gser gi gnod pa 'phrog par mi nus so// rgyal po zas
28a3(1): gtsang gis bsams pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa dang / sbyar gdon mi za bar lag gnyis kyis glang po thub
28a4(1): kyis de bas na gzho nu'i ming po che stong gi stobs can zhes btags so// bar sdom la/ khye'u dang rtsed mo dag dang ni// rig pa khang bzangs dang ni// dad pa
28a5(1): mtshon can dge ba'i srid// dmag dang btsun mo rnams yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang / yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha
28a6(1): la yi ge slob par btang nas/ yi ge slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi ge bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di
28a7(1): nings shes so de nas yi ge gnyis dang gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i par bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas sbas pa/ 'di dag kyang ngas shes
28b1(1): su gtsun dag smras pag/ sram nan chas smras pa/ 'dugats+tshan+dan s+t+rai kI 'di tsam skad kyi gzhan ni 'dug nas ma 'tshal to// de nas byang chub sems dang
28b2(1): gzas te sa nanas ba srung skye pa/ yini 'di'i ming tsa yin smras shig/ des smras pa ma 'tshal to// byang chub sems dpas gsungs
28b3(1): 'jig rten tu gnyis shig byung na yi ge 'di mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o// byang chub sems dpas
28b4(1): yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis klags la nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang bar byas tshangs pa'i yi ge tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to// gang
28b5(1): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyir pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhing po bzang len zhes bya ba des glang po'i gnya' bar zhon pa bslabs nas/ 'phong gi
28b6(1): slob dpon lhar bcas zhes bya ba des 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa la slob pa la zhugs pa na/ bzang len gyis ltar bcas la smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin
28b7(1): du gzhon gzhan dag ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad spobs shig/ lha sbyin 'di ni sdig pa'i las byed pa yin pas 'jig rten thams cad la gnod
29a1(1): por gyur dang mi rung gis 'di la garang du ma bstan cig/ gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la legs par slabs pas gnas lnga po 'di
29a2(1): lta ste/ rgyad nas phog pa dang / sgra grag pa dang / gzhan du phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag la yang byang bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs kun tu sgra grags pa shAkya rnams kyi nang du byang ba'i gzhon nu
29a3(1): zhes bya ba nas grag par ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi le tsa che rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa
29a4(1): rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po rin po ches 'dri byung gis/ dong la de kho na
29a5(1): la dbul lo snyam nas/ de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan nas/ zing de dong ba las sbyar ba'i rgyal por rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po ched dam
29a6(1): pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug pa'i las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des/ glang po che'i dam pa deng ltar rgyun gyis brgyad pa mthong nas des de phrag dog chen po skyes te/ 
29a7(1): de zas dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ thang me ma pa 'ad ba su'i yin/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ gzhon mu shA kya thub pa mtshan mapan rnams kyis 'khor los srur
29b1(1): ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa deng la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po che 'di ni skyes su phul lo// lnga spyir lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ 
29b2(1): re shig de 'khor las sbyar bar ma gyur pas de khyed cag de lta glang po renA 'bul lam zhes smras nas/ tha lcag gis glang po che bsad do// ji tsam ra phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs
29b3(1): pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis so// des bsams pa gdon mi za bar
29b4(1): 'di la lhas sbyiran gyi mthus/ bsad kyis ma la bdag gis kyang 'di la mthun sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste/ dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur bar de mtha' cig
29b5(1): tu bor ro// ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas nges pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ 
29b6(1): raM rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// sus bsang / lha sbyin gyis so// mthon mi mchod pa zhig bya ba yin na ma legs pa zhig byas so// phyogs gang du bsad/ 'o ni ro// 'a
29b7(1): sras khyer te 'das/ dga' rims// des dgangs pa gang na mo za bar de gnyis kyis/ 'di la mthu sad dkyis ma la ran
30a1(1): kyang 'di la mthus dpar b+ha'o snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste/ ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las rab rim pa bdun dang 'o bas bdun las bzlas
30a2(1): de bor ro// de lhung gshongs btod pa/ glang po che'i gshongs glang po che'i gshongs bya bar gyur to// der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas
30a3(1): deng seng du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed do// 'dir smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad// dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du khyer// byang chub sems da/ 
30a4(1): phyag gis par snang la la// rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs// gzhonu rnams kyis smras pa/ gcod pa byed du 'dod ngo zhes de rnams phyir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
30a5(1): shAkya thub pas kyang gnas nas 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa byed du phyir byung ngo // gzhonu rnams la 'bras rnga ba bzhin du gcod par byed do// de rnams kyis shing gcad cing bcad pa
30a6(1): rnams 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' ni ze'i gcod pa'i gcod par mdzad de/ des shing gcad cing bcad pa rnams ma 'gyel te/ de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / gzho nu rnams
30a7(1): kyis sbas pa/ shes ldan dag byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la byang ngo zhes thos nas 'di gcod pa byed pa yang ma shes pa las na 'di bdag/ 
30b1(1): cag pas stobs dang ldan pa ni ma yin no// ltar bdag cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de dag thams cad ni 'gyel la/ 'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni de bzhin du 'dug go/ 
30b2(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang bzo la byang ba ma shes pa
30b3(1): byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing mthu la yang smod par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ des de dang mthun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas/ des shing
30b4(1): de dag thams cad chemachem zer rjes 'gyel te/ shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so// de rnams tshangs byed pa la zhugs te/ de rnams kyis de 'ben
30b5(1): du lcags kyi ta la bdun dang rnga dang phag gcugs so// lha sbyin gyis rkang brabs byas te/ lcags mnga' 'phangs pa dang / lcags kyi shing ta la cig phigs so// 
30b6(1): byang chub sems dpas lcags mnga' 'phangs pa dang / shing ti la bdun dang rnga dang phag las thal nas lcags kyi mda' des la zug klus phyung ba dang chu phun sum tshogs
30b7(1): ba zhig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'thung bar brtsams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod rten po rtsigs ste/ deng sang du sang
31a1(1): phyu/  du zlus gas rnamamakhan tsha lcer nas byar byung
31a2(1): kyis gzhon shAkya thub pa shing rtar zhugs nas nang du zhugs pa lung bstan pa/ gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ gdon mi za bar 'khor los sbyar
31a3(1): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzho nu mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to// zhes thos so thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ shAkya rnam
31a4(1): khasogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzho nu lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor lo sa skur ba'i rgyal por gyur ro// 
31a5(1): zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so// gzhon 'di gal te lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir
31a6(1): phyi bzhin dorang gis 'di khyim phub shig/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer ro// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gzhonu la bud med thams
31a7(1): bstan nas/ 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mar blang bar bya'o// de nas kha cig gis sbas pa/ lha gnon ni sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la bstsol du gas
31b1(1): la de dgang la mgra ba bskyed par gyur pa de btsun mor blang bar bgyi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis sbas pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyan rnam kha sna tshogs
31b2(1): rin po ches sbas pa'i phung po spungs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang grong khyer phyag dar byi dor byed du bcug nas/ N+ya sar dang ches grangs dang / yud tsam dag
31b3(1): bstun te gdan la gshegs pa so seng ge'i khri bshams pa la gzhonu shAkya thub pa bzhag nas/ seng ge'i khri dang nye bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po spungs te/ blon po rnams dang
31b4(1): gzhan yang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams nang du zhugs so// de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i cha byad dang rgyan dang
31b5(1): gos gyon nas zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyun de dag de rnams la byin no// shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya
31b6(1): bA gzugs dang lang tshol ba ba pa de ma sod nas/ shUm+b+ha la gA na dbyug pa can gis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpas rgyan sbyin gyis song shig/ des sbas pa/ yab
31b7(1): ci'o cag la rgyan mchis sam/ bra ma med pa ma yin med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang bzhed pa de 'dam par mdzad do// yab 'dam yang drang mi 'dam sa
32a1(1): rlung de kho na bdag gis sbru ma ta ba lags so// bu mo gal te de lta na shin tu 'gro dgos pas song shig/ de nas grags 'dzin ma na chod na'o// 
32a2(1): zhing cha lugs bzang ba/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa/ bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi brjid deng ldan pas nang du zhugs
32a3(1): nas spyod lam dul bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar 'dug go// byang chub sems dpas rgyan thams cad byin nas sor dub gyi rgya kho na lus pa byang chub
32a4(1): sems dpas de la snyan pa dang / de nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas mchog tu mnyes pa byas pa des/ seng ge'i khri'i sras la 'dzegs nas/ byang chub sem
32a5(1): dpa'i phyag nas rang gis byung ngo // rnon po rnams dang seR+Sha s+ya'i spyi zo'i tshogs gtso bo bkur ba rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ni bud med thams
32a6(1): rbad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te// 'das glan na'i rigs dang bstan par nus pas 'di zang bur bya'o// de nas rgyal po bas gca dgus grags 'dzi
32a7(1): ma la zung med 'khor gyi khri dang ga' sub ma grub pa'i btsun mer blangs sa// mas nyid kyis gang ni tshe sangs bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig can tha
32b1(1): nga'i tshe shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba skye bar gyur to/ de nyi ma cig cing khru bad+har skye bar 'gyur la/ ji tsam nyi ma ma shar pa de srid du ni sen mos kyang bcad du rung
32b2(1): la nyi ma shar ni mtshon gyis kyang mi mchod cing mes kyang mi tshig pa zhig/ ser skya'i gzhi dang lhas bstan gyi bar na 'ab ba chu ro ha ka zhes bya ba'i 'gram na skyes te
32b3(1): dus dus su tshwa 'brug pas de'i rtsa ba zlas na rlung gi shugs kyis 'gyel te/ 'gags bzhin chu bcad de 'dug go// de nas rgyal po legs par rab tu sad kyis yul na
32b4(1): chu med par mi rung la/ zas gtsang gi yang chus ma rung ste/ rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring ba/ shing dge ba'i me tog 'gyel nas
32b5(1): 'bab chu ro ha ka 'gags su 'gyur te mchis na/ gzhonu mthu dang ldan pa zhes thos kyis de btang ba'i rigs so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo gzhonu
32b6(1): la bka' mi stsol lo// 'dun zas sbas pa/ lha bdag la gnang ba 'ba' zhig stsol cig dang / ci nas kyang gnon la yang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs
32b7(1): par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis khas blangs so// 'dun pas 'ba' tshu ra ta ka'i 'gram cu gzhon rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal re re gcugs
33a1(1): sa rnas pa/ man ngan ltadams tsam du 'dang / mas ma ma' shing bar zhugs nas spya mas tshal du dong ba las/ swamAn gyi skye mos tshal tshwa ste
33a2(1): rnas dang pa nig phra ba na/ lha sbyin gyis mangs bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skad mos tshal du ltung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bzung nas mang 'brang ste/ sman gyis ldan
33a3(1): nas sos so// lha sbyin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la spring ba/ ngang pa 'o ni snga ngas bzung bzung ba yin gyis bskur cig/ byang skems dpas slar spring ba/ ngas gang gi tshe kho na sems
