99a1(1): chung zhing nyes dmigs dang kun gan nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang rab tu bden pa'i rjes su bsdams pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyir phyogs
99a2(1): kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do// gang gi tshe gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa
99a3(1): yang dag phal gyi chos bshad na shes par nus gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden la
99a4(1): bzhi po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang / lam de rgya cher bshad do// dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa mtshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na mtshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du
99a5(1): btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis sman de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam
99a6(1): mngon par rtogs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang chos thob pa dang chos rig pa dang chos kyi gting sleb pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang the
99a7(1): tshom las rgal ba dang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gis mi 'akris pa dang / smyon pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang
99a8(1): na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so bdag cag mngon par 'phags lags te/ bcom
99b1(1): ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skabs sna mchil das kyis/ dge bsnyen du bzung drug sol/ dang sran chang sring 'tshor bar srog dang yang bsngos te skabs su mchi bar mdzan
99b2(1): par dang lags so// btsun pa de'i slang du 'dir nal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsang bas gnang po/ 
99b3(1): nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang ba rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan la bde bar zhugs pa dang gcad ning bsod pa'i bza' ba
99b4(1): dang bca' ba dag rang kyi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grang du mar zhing bsod ba'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bskabs shing tshim par par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
99b5(1): gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
99b6(1): grags pa'i ma ngang chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par mdzad/ yang dag par bzed bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
99b7(1): mdzad de nam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par ba rin du bcug/ yang dag par bzed bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dgapa par mdzad nas gangan las zhengs de gshegs so// 
99b8(1): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas ni the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsum pa tshe dang ldan pa grags pa las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam pa smin pas mchis thang
100a1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag grags pa 'di nyid kyi las stsags pa snying brkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar nus pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las ngag byas
100a2(1): shing bsags te/ 'di nyid kyi las byas shing bstsags pa dag gzhan sre 'azhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khas la rnam par smin par mi
100a3(1): 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gyi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shi bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang
100a4(1): rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams skal pa rgyar yang nI/ chung mi za ba 'dra tshogs dang dus/ rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ dge slong dag sngon wA ra NA si'i
100a5(1): grong khyer dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong byams pa'i sems nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems pa zhi gnas pa nges bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na mi ro zhig mtho nas de de
100a6(1): la zhen pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ bsod snyoms spyad nas slar zlog pa dang ji tsam mi ro de rnam par spros shing rnam par gyur ltas pa dang de nyid du 'dun du zhig nas des de nyid du 'dod chags
100a7(1): dang thal ba skyed de/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni/ gnon grags pa 'di nyid yin no// 'dis den 'dod chags dang bral bskyed ngo // des na de ltar chung ma'i
100b1(1): Sh+TA na/ rgyu du shA rgyu smra tu ma sa ga na tsha tu ba sa
100b2(1): ba rnams kyi 'dren pa yin pas/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu banag pa'ang 'dren pa rnams ni spangs la gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bul bslab pa
100b3(1): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag yirabyas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do/ wA ra NA si'i khyim bdag nyid rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis
100b4(1): dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa gang po dang dri med dang ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs de rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa sna dang kha spu breg ste gos ngur smrig 'gos
100b5(1): nas dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam tu sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma
100b6(1): yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir de ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re shig shim gzhon pa shin tu bde ba yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smri bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
100b7(1): med paR+Sha ra butu byAng shIng / mul bdag cag gyis kyang skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur sdig bgos nas dang pas yang dag khon+da sa khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o// snyan mo/ de nas
100b8(1): rigs krI ga tso bo'i grwa gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang 'on pa dang lnga pa gang po dang dri med dang ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtso bo'i khuwA ra Na sen sa byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangam
101a1(1): bder dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khor nas rigs kyi
101a2(1): gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa gang po dang dri med dang ba yang bdag dang / lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// / 
101a3(1): btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// tshe
101a4(1): dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa
101a5(1): bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so// gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te go
101a6(1): dur smrig bgos nas/ dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa'i tshe de nyid la rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas
101a7(1): te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye bzang do tshangs par spyod pa bsten to bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so// zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grob
101b1(1): bkran shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang / bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'daso// wA ra NA si'i grong mi'i gtso bo// gtso bo rnams kyi
101b2(1): khye'i lnga bcus/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa ste grags pa dang gang po dang dri med dang ba lang bdag dang lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnas
101b3(1): sgra dang baspu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas/ dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byango zhes tho sa// zos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ma sangs rgyas mchog
101b4(1): ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir de ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa ste grags pa dang gang po dang
101b5(1): dri med dang ba lang bdag dang lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re shig shin tu gzhon pa shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang sku dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa
101b6(1): kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/ mal bdag cag kyang snga dang baspu bregs nas/ gos ngur sdig bgos nas dang pas yang dag pa po nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nge sam me// 
101b7(1): de nas grong mi gtso bo rnams kyi bre'u lnga bcu po dag lar rdzas nas byang nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song se lpags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig
102a1(1): / tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong mi gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i sa chos 'dul
102a2(1): ba las rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po la gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
102a3(1): bal rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa dag nyid gtong bar gan so// gcig pu dben pa bag yod
102a4(1): brtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid stong par gnas par/ gang gi phyir rigs gi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig pa gos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs
102a5(1): par skyed pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de/ de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum byas te/ bsgrubs nas bdag cag skye ba za do// tshangs par spyod pasten to bya ba byaso// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes zhes
102a6(1): go bar byed cing / tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug cu dang drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan pangaso// de nas
102a7(1): bcom ldan 'das wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i'i dgas kyi na gsan zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las
102b1(1): grol ba yin no// dge slong dag byed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa de las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo bang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi
102b2(1): rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i tshod du rgyu zhing de nga la/ khyed gnyis shing ni gcig tu ma 'gro shig nga yang gleng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gsheg so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge
102b3(1): sbyong go'u ta ma 'di wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na 'dug nas/ de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces chos ston te/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// / 
102b4(1): dge slong ngag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thas cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong
102b5(1): khyer sde can gang na par rgyu zhing 'gro'o// zer gyis/ ma la bad gis de 'di lta ste/ bkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snya mo// de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ 
102b6(1): bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs bcad pas gsol pa/ ma grol bar 'du shes na// ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems// bad gis dge sbyong
102b7(1): ma grol bas 'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te 'di ltar ste dkrug pa las kyi phyir nye bar 'ong so// snyam du thug su
103a1(1): chung nas tshigs su bcang bka' stsal pa/ nga ni sgra dang mi rnams kyi// 'ching ba gang yin kun las grol// bar chang byed pa khyod bcom par// sdig can de ltar shes par bgyi/ 
103a2(1): bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems kyis ba gi sems sheso snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba la/ yid la bcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// 
103a3(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi
103a4(1): rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya bar gong ma bzhin du'o// da yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba
103a5(1): der gshegs so// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las nyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis wA raNA sir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs na
103a6(1): lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang grong khyer ste can du byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshad tshing gang na pa der gshegs
103a7(1): ste byer nas/ shing zhig gi drung du rten te nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhug so// de'i tshe drug cu ste bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol dunyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed dag
103b1(1): par byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral de zo so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud me de 'tshol zhing ras pal can gyi nags cheng gang na pa der dong
103b2(1): ba dang drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dang par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba thugs mchog tu dul bzhi pa dang dul ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lnga brar dpal gyis
103b3(1): 'bar zhing shing zhig gi drung na bsten te zhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci bud med
103b4(1): gzigs sam/ gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed ca gi phyir 'ong / btsun pa 'di ni bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi snga rol du bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid dga' bar
103b5(1): bgyid/ dga' mgur spyong par byed de/ de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid dga' bar bgyid dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol lags so// 
103b6(1): gzhon nu dag ji snyam du sems bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang bdag nyid tshol ba yin pa gang 'dam/ btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyi bdag nyid 'chol ba la dam lag so// gzhon nu dag de'i phyir na 'dug
103b7(1): shig dang / khyed la ches pa shid ngo // de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khong nas
104a1(1): ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par bzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/ 
104a2(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tho ge ma'i dus chos kyi theg ma greng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i gtam dang tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / zo ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams gnog
104a3(1): rlung zhing nyes dmigs dang nges par byang ba dang rab tu dben pa'i rjes bsngags pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do// gang gi tshe de dag bco ldan 'das kyis dga' pa'i
104a4(1): sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang skal pa dang ldan pa dang yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa shes pa nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas
104a5(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phral gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'phags pa'i bden bzhi po 'di lta ste sdug bsngal dang krar 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam de rgya cher bshad// dper na gos gcang
104a6(1): man gnog med pa chen rtsi'i 'os pa'i nang gzags sam/ gzhanan dag pad mang du khyad cag byar 'ang / btsan pa 'dran bdag cag drag cas bzang ba'i chags grang khyer snga tsamedra bcug na tshen gyis
104a7(1): bems par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du drug cu sde babang po'i tshogs kyis bsan de nyid la khod bzhin du 'a lags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa 'di la sde sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang
104b1(1): mngon par rtogs so// denas drug du ste bzang pa'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang chos rigs pa dang chos gting slebs pa dang som nilas rgal pa dang thacom pas rgal ba dang gzhan gyi
104b2(1): dring mi 'dzag pa dang / gzhar grim bkri ba dang ston pas bsgyur ba'i chos rnams pa mi 'jigs pa tho ba ras san las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der logasu thal ma
104b3(1): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skaskyabasu mchilag
104b4(1): kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol to// deng sla na chad ji srid bu tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyab su mchi bar dad lags so// de nas drug rgya sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
104b5(1): stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yid rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhin bram ze lnga zhes bya ba phyug
104b6(1): kha nor mang ba longs spyod che ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi thugs drag por gyur pa zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig na gnyen zad nor zad par gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye bo/ 
104b7(1): phrag sum cu rtsa drug bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes pa skyes pa de'i tshe/ bram ze lnga chung ma dang lhan cig grong khyer sde can du 'ongs so// bram ze lngas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes bsnyes so
105a1(1): zhes thos nas des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo bcom ldan 'das kyis blan med pa'i ye shes bstes te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de da ni grong khyer
105a2(1): sde can du bsod snyoms la gshegs na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul dra gang gi phyir bdag cag gi phyir khyim na nyi ma gcig gi kha zas kyang med kyis/ ngos khyod gtar bcug te/ kashwa
105a3(1): kha na lnga zhig srin por blang ngo // des smras brje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod ceg/ bram ze lngas chung ma bram ze cig la btar bcu gnas kAr ShA pa Ni lnga bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol pa'i phyir skyin po'i tshul du
105a4(1): blangs so// de'i chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag ni byang chub sems dpas lan 'ga' yang dri ma can dang gos ngan pa gyon pa ma gzigs so// bram ze lus khyim bdag las rgyan rnams bskyes nas chung
105a5(1): cham bston no// de nas bram ze lhas chung ma dang lhan cig gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
105a6(1): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bad gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze skal cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan
105a7(1): 'das bram ze'i bu'i bkangs gangan pader gshegs de byon nas/ gdon ba shams pa shing sa bzhug so// bram belas bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ chung ma dang lhan cigagaced
105b1(1): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag rang gi la gnas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag rang gi la gnas bstabs shing tshim par byas/ 
105b2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol yin nas phyag bcabs so// lhung bzed gyupari gnas gastan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom
105b3(1): ldan 'das kyis gas bram ze lnga la yin bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs so// de'i chung mas rgyan rnams grol te bzhag pa de ma zin par len pas brkus so zhes bram ze lngas thos nas/ sdug bsngal zhing yid
105b4(1): mi bde bar gyur te/ 'brog dgon pa zhig du song nas/ nga la rgyan sbyin drag la yod/ gzhan byar med kyis bdag mchi'o snyam pa dang / ji tsam na mo zhig gis dong rkos nas song ngo // bram ze la ngo mtshan
105b5(1): skyes nas de na ci yod re shig lta'o snyam pa las ji tsam na rgyan de mthong nas des rgyan de blangs ste khyim dra 'ongs so// lha'i chung ma yang sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas gdungs nas khyim phyag dar byed pa na 'di
105b6(1): lhar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sang sa kyi mthus ji tsam na gser gyi bum pa 'tsher bag can zhig mthong ngo // lngas de la dris pa/ bzang mo'i ni ci yar des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gis gser gyi bum pa
105b7(1): zhig mthong phyi gdes kyang smras pa'i 'ang mo po bos kyang rgyan de mdong ngo // de gnyis kyis lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dang pa bskyed/ de ltar mngon par dad pa dang bco ldan 'das kyis de gzis kyis
106a1(1): de ltar 'gags pa'i 'dre pa pa'i nogs par 'gyur ba/ de lta rgu'i nas shAd pa ma dzad pa smra rgyum b+he rgyu ma drung rgyanas ste 'a gas pa
106a2(1): mkhyer rtso ma'i shu mthog/ mi shes kyi ni rjes bcid nas can tu zhugs pa'i 'grus su ma na sum du byas so//  ma 'am 'i rlom mi 'angs nas pa'i
106a3(1): bsdams lhung ba zed dang chos gos bsnams te snong ched la mi so snyoms la zhugs so// dum ma ma rlung skyed ba na sa ma mas rmugs pa na 'di sam du das
106a4(1): te/ ma la sangs grong khyer sde can der thog mar sra nig la chos bshad snyam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dis 'di sngam du dgengs te/ ngas gleng ba'i bra mo dga' mo dang dga' sto zas ma
106a5(1): la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal brang ba'i rdul 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pan 'dis mar sar dad 'o thug sgang rje wAr dang ra bas bsnyen bkur byas so// 
106a6(1): de nas pam ldan 'dus phreng ba'i bra ma dga' stabs ma'o kham gangan pa gzigs so// rdzing ba'i bri me ga la mi dag 'i skabs mas bcom ldan 'das kyang ring sa nas mdzang // mdzanganas
106a7(1): bzhed la bcugs gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan pasams pa de nyi sa btsugs so// de nas glang ba'i bu ma dga' mo dang / 
106b1(1): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la go bos phyag 'tshal te brags byas te phyogs gcig tu 'jug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas macom 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang
106b2(1): dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par tu 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs/ 
106b3(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i gtam dang tshul khrims kyi gtam dang mtho ris kyi gtam dang 'dod pa rnams la gan
106b4(1): rgyung zhing zhes dmigs dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byung ba rab tu dbyen pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rgya zer bshad do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan pa
106b5(1): kyis de das dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang mgro ba'i sems dang sgri ba zi dang rtsal ba'i sems dngasal badza ldan pa dang yang dag rgyal gyi rnam 'i shad na shes par num par mche
106b6(1): / Angs nas bcomaldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag pa la rnaMHsa pa shad pa kyang seMn rmugs pa'i na ba ban pa ste/ skyug rgya sa s+ya dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dpa la
106b7(1): rgya cher bshad do// dper na gos gtsang man gnog myed pa rgyun gyi thos pa'i nang du bcug na/ rmod rmyi legs par 'dzin tu btub pa de bzhin du gling ba'i b+ha dga' mo dang dag stobasams snyam
106b8(1): de nyid la khong bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog la dpal ma mngon par rtogs so// de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dgal stobs
107a1(1): mas ches mthong ba dang chos mthob pa chos rig pa dang chos kyi gting slebs pa dang the tshom las rgag padung gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyi mi dkri ba dang ston pas bstan pa'i chos nas/ 
107a2(1): la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag pags so mngon par
107a3(1): 'phag so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol// deng slan chad ji srid mtsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te
107a4(1): skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang legs so// de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobasams bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad
107a5(1): dugasol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' ste bas ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' sno bsams/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung
107a6(1): pas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas// gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag rang gi la gnas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing
107a7(1): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi la gnas skabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol yin te phyag bcabs shing lung bzed gyu par rig nas san ches dma' bzhig blangs te/ 
107b1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang
107b2(1): dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzed bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs
107b3(1): pan 'di snyam du dgongs te// ngas yul ma ga d+ha 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge slong dam bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas pa de dbang du gyur pas tshegs chu dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du gyur pa su
107b4(1): zhig yod snyam mo// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur bstir bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri
107b5(1): mor bya ba dang brjed par bya ba dang mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza na'i chu klung gi 'gram gyi ba sti gnas na dka' thu ba spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 
107b6(1): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa khog gtugs pa 'di lam ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung
107b7(1): 'gam can dbang du byas pa// 'di bangar dgyur rin chogs chungs su po'i tshigs chen po dang du 'gyur rogs mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can grob sa gnas gangan ze/ 
108a1(1): der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan gshams
108a2(1): ba nas 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong tshur bron dge sbyong chen po byin pa legs so// dge slong chen po yun ring mo zhig lags nas 'khor 'khor te 'dir byon/ dge sbyong chen po gdan shams pa nyid
108a3(1): la bzhugs shig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang // bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag
108a4(1): par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
108a5(1): can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung gal te khyod la mi bde bar med na khyod kyi me khang dung zhag gcig cig 'dug go// dge sbyong chen po bdag mi bde ba ma mchis na/ 'on kyang de na klag drug
108a6(1): pa zhig gnas te des khyod mtho' 'tsham par gyur tu mchi'o// 'od srung khyod kyis re shig gnang bar gyis shig dang mthi 'tsham par mi 'gyur ro// dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la mtho ma 'tsham na
108a7(1): dab srung na btsong byar 'anar bzungs shi'i nges patsa ma 'angs ring rgyam 'o grang ngas pa ma gyimim 'ad par dag shegs te byen ma mo'i ma phyir rom dus pas bas banas/ meb kyimang dra ngagra
108b1(1): te nyid kyis na 'a mang shams nas sru dang por bsangs te/ snyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bregs par bzhag sa/ bzhugs so klusadug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // 
108b2(1): mthong nas kyang thos pa'i mthus drad pa phyung ngo // ba ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus drang po byung ngo // kla gadrug pas zos pa'i mthus 'bar bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
108b3(1): me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'a bar rab tu' bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce cig
108b4(1): tu gyur pas sreg par byed do// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas bsregs pa mthong ngo
108b5(1): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma chen po'i 'di ltar mdzes pa klu gadrug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grang / kyi hu de nyon mongs pa bdag gi tshi ge mnyan to snyam mo// de nas
108b6(1): bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ da lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas chas bcad kyi mangs rdzu 'phrul ji lta bur mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par gzhag nas
108b7(1): klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnang ba mi byed cing de la dul bar mthen nas/ lung bzed du bcug ste/ steng byas 'od srung ralo pa can de la sbyin pa del bu zhig bya'o// 
109a1(1): nas/ ma pa ma nu ba kyis rngu phrul dzin bu mngon par 'dumadzad pa lazugs mnyam par gzhag nas mes nga gadrug pa'i metha~Mb kyis gnan pa
109a2(1): kyang de'i zhus la gnod pa mi byed pa de la bu mngon par 'du mdzad do// dul ba mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gangan pa der bsdams te gshegs so// leng rgyas 'od srung
109a3(1): ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig 'od srung gson no// dge sbyong chen
109a4(1): po khyod kyis lhung bzed nas bsnams te byon pa ci// 'od srung klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnasu mi ster ba dengs btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas khyer
109a5(1): te 'od so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bco pa yin no snyam la mo// de nas bani
109a6(1): ldan 'das lteng rgyus na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti nas nA ga tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'i lnga brgya tsam me la yongasu spyod pa re re'i me
109a7(1): ma bsum su sa mi 'bring rdzob rgya ma de/ denas bram pa'i bu'i rnams ma'i longs su spong bar 'dong na/ ming thar bar ma nus so nas bram pa bre'u de rnams ring rgyas 'od srung rabab senas nab
109b1(1): der dong ste byin nas deng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cagazhugs la yongasu spyod par 'tshal na zhugs de sbar par rngo ma thog lag/ 
109b2(1): so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nyen kor na gnas na// de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can pa
109b3(1): bco ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po khyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su sbyong pa/ 
109b4(1): 'tshal na me de sbar par rngo ma thog nas pa dag 'di snyam du sems te bdag nyen 'khor na/ dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu zhib ma byung grang snyam mo bgyid do// 'od srung me sbar bar 'dod dam/ 
109b5(1): dge slong chen po sbar du gsol// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyedadu
109b6(1): sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyamo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gno
109b7(1): kyi nags chang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams semel yongs su spang nas me bsad par 'dod na/ bsad ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
110a1(1): gangan ba der dong ste lpags nas// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can la 'di skad ces smra so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su srung nas zhug
110a2(1): mgum par 'tshal la/ dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs legs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par ma bdag gi nyen 'khor na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snya ma// 
110a3(1): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'angs la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mthen par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bad gi bram ze'i/ 
110a4(1): khye'u rnams zhugs la yongasu spyad nas zhugs dgum pa 'tshal la/ dgum pa'i rngo ma thog nas/ bdag 'ang snyam du sems te/ bdag gi zhen 'khor dge sbyong chen po zhugs na de'i mthum byung grang snyam babyi / 
110a5(1): 'od srung me re bas dngam dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lnga rnams kyi lnga'i mthus me de rang ning shi'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
110a6(1): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
110a7(1): ma can gyis sti gnas kyi nags kyi chang tshing na zhugs so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na lte rgyas 'od srung ral la pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na sbar bar ma nus so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
110b1(1): can 'di snyam du sems te bang gi'i nu 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byang bar ma gyur grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung dral pa can bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der song ste phyin nas/ @
110b2(1): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongasu spyod par 'tshal na sbar bar rngo ma thog nas/ bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi
110b3(1): nyen 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do// 'od srung me de skur par 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po sbyar du gsol/ den pa 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang
110b4(1): kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lA rnams kyi mthus de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snas du sems te/ 'di ltar dge slong chen po rdzu 'bral che zhing mthu che ga yin te/ ya mtshan rme
110b5(1): mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshing ching na bzhug so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na ldeng rgyas thod srung ral pa can
110b6(1): rang nyid me la yongasu spang nas bsad par 'dod na bas dam nu so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rdal pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nyen 'khor na dge slong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung por ma gyur grong snyam mo// 
110b7(1): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad dro gsol// 'dir bdag
111a1(1): nyid zhugs pa yongs su spyad nas// zhugs 'gum par 'tshal na dgum pa rngo ma thogs nas/ bdag 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gi nyer 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs
111a2(1): na/ de'i mthu zhig byung ba rna ma gyur grang sam bgyid do// drang srong me de bsang dam dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid
111a3(1): shi'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcoM pa yin snyam mo// de nas bco ldan 'das ldeng rgyas na lteng
111a4(1): rgyas 'od srung rnal ba can gyi bstig nas kyi nags tshar tshing na bzhugs so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas
111a5(1): sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bstims kyang bsad ma nus so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi
111a6(1): nyen 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bco ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge
111a7(1): / skyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ dge sbyong chen po 'dir bang gi me khang thams cad 'a bar rab tu' bar kun tu rab tu' bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 
111b1(1): gzhan yang skye bo'i chags chen po sgoms na zhugs dgum pa'i rngom thog nas 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi nyen 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig blang bar ma 'gyur grang sam bgying ngo // 'od srung me
111b2(1): khang de zhi bar bya'am dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams spangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lnga rnams kyi lha'i mthus mekha' re rang nyid zhi bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas bong srung ral ma can 'di sna
111b3(1): du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// sa ka/ 'dul ba gzhi// / dum du bzhi pa// / bam po brgyad cu gya
111b4(1): brgyad pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas pod srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pa mtshan mo la bab pa ni bci ldan
111b5(1): 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'a bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu lus kyi phyogs
111b6(1): gcig tu 'drug go// ldeng rgyas bong srung ral pa car de nying mtshan po rgyugar rnams la blta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngun/ me'i brang po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu' bar te me lde gcig tu gyur nas
111b7(1): mig pa byeng pa dpa'i ma ming / mang sa 'a du seMs na pa ga gsangs kyang // 'dig 'i gyu pa'i drang ba ba 'atu ba ra tu dis rna chu
112a1(1): @nas sreg par byed pa gzhi yod do snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung dral pa can nang par langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song nas phyin pa dang bco ldan 'a
112a2(1): kha 'di sang ces gsol so// dge slong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol 'dir bdag ma dang sram rgya slar rnams la bal ba na dge sbyong chen po'i sman sngan zhugs kyi phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun rabatung bar tam
112a3(1): lce gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i spyan sngun me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu
112a4(1): 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo// 'od srung ci me la yongs spyod dam/ nga me la yongs su mi smod de de lta mod kyi 'dir ma dang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kha dog 'phags
112a5(1): pas mtshan mo la bab pa na gang na ba der 'ongs te lpags nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed
112a6(1): pa bzhi 'di ltar bu'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'drag pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te'i'adi ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che med kyi bdag kya
112a7(1): 'tha bcom pa yin ni mam mo// denam pa tsa lan 'angs steng rgyas myung rab bcan bye bsti gnas kyi nags ma tshang na bzhugs so/ denas la rnams kyi dbang po brgya brim pa dag 'phags pas mngan sel bab pan/ 
112b1(1): bcom ldan 'das long gang na ba der song ste brin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de dper na mo'i brang po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu' bar the me lce cig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag pas kyang ches
112b2(1): 'phags la chos bzang ba la bu'i lus kyi grogs gcig tu 'dug go// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid mtshan mo rmya skar rnams la blta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan/ me'i phung po'abar rab tu 'bar
112b3(1): kun tu bar tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyams te sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod pa de 'di ltar de'i 'dun nas me'i phung po chen po
112b4(1): 'bar rab tu 'bor ti/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig yod do// snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das gan ba der song ste byin nas btso/ 
112b5(1): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag mdung sum rgya skar rnams la blta ba na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi me'i phung po 'bar rab tu
112b6(1): 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig mdong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung
112b7(1): pochen pa'i bar rabatu bar ku btu ma gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bzha brjong bci mchis so// gram so// 'od srung cing me la yengs su spong dmang me la yongs su ma myo dang / de gamang gyi 'di
113a1(1): @#ma dang srab la rnams kyi dbang po brgya brim bdoga'apags pas mtshan mo la bab pa nang gang na ba der 'ongs te phrin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na mo'i
113a2(1): nga phung po bar rab tu' bar kun tu rab tu' bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg pa bzhi po de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang bal bu'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu bdug pa yin
113a3(1): / de nas bco ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung rab pa can 'di snyam du sems te'i ji ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod dkyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no// snyam mo// 
113a4(1): / de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// ro nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang
113a5(1): na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhis po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas me'i phung po chen po lnga po de dag me lce
113a6(1): gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// lteng rgyas 'od spa srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan
113a7(1): mo rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na/ bco ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po'i'abar rab tu' bar zhes bya ba nas bsreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sos
113b1(1): te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su sbyong de 'di ltar de'i mdun du me'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa'i bar zhig yod do snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rdal pa can nang par sngar
113b2(1): langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol 'dir ba dag ma dang gsum rgyu skar rnaMs la blta ba na
113b3(1): dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na/ zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su
113b4(1): sbyong de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu'abar kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce cig tu gyur na sreg par byed pa zhig mchis snyam mo 'od srung cing me la yongs su sbyong ngam/ ngo me la yongs su mi spyod de de lta
113b5(1): mod kyi 'dir me dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo' bos phrag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po
113b6(1): 'bar rab bu bzhi po de dag nas snga ma bzhin du me'i phung po chen po lnga po de'abar nas me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches
113b7(1): 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phrogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no// de nas steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'angang skam sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mtha
114a1(1): @che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra btso pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags chang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
114a2(1): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi'i dag gnas na mchod sprin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab bo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rul pa can 'di snyam du sems te gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis/ dge slong chen po 'di ltar rdzu'aphrul che zhing
114a3(1): 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod kyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thug
114a4(1): kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud de/ de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng srungs ral pa can la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byang nas bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan skye bo
114a5(1): tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs rapa pa can gyi 'dug gnas na/ mchod ston de zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du sems te// 'dir bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bskur sa chen po
114a6(1): byung zhing bza' ba dang bcas pa rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye ma nga ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la longs spyod du gzhug go snyam mo// de nas bco ldan
114a7(1): 'das kyis thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas sa lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
114b1(1): bcom ldan 'das la dis ces bzes sa/ dge sbyong dron tam 'od srungs 'ongs so/ dge slong nan po khyong ci'i srang dus ga bdun 'di nas gsan du bgrang lags/ 'od mang khyod kyi 'dug nas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed
114b2(1): pa bab nas/ 'di snyam dgal te ma gang+gA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis
114b3(1): kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyis sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo // 'o na ci'i slad du 'dir blon lags
114b4(1): 'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur pas chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po rang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ 
114b5(1): kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung ba dag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam sems pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin
114b6(1): dge sbyong chen po tsa bder kho na long skyong du gsol// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge slong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
114b7(1): yin nomam me/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gang rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung mal pa can gyi bsi banas kyinags mang cing na bzhugs can/ de nas meng rgyas 'o dasrungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'ang sang ces
115a1(1): na sa[] [] 'das gdan pa nga/ rnam su sa na 'das la du / 8 byu mas ba
115a2(1): gnas to// dge slong chen po de'i slang du bdag gi nyen du bzhugs shig dang / bdag gis khyong la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho bskor ro/ bcoM ldan 'das kyis steng rgyas 'od srungs pa
115a3(1): pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lteng rgyas 'tshong lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// 'od srung de'i phyir song shi ga da'ang 'ong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
115a4(1): steng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'jam
115a5(1): bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te lteng rgyas 'od srung rnal pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na pa der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// 
115a6(1): de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gnas bla shams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang skad ces gsol to// dge slong
115a7(1): chen po byin tam// 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'di rangs 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shing 'jam bu zhes bya ba gang gis
115a8(1): 'jam bu'i rdzing du gang gas pa de las bde ba dang dro nga ro dang ldan pa'i 'jam bu'i sem rnams kyis nyung bzeng ba gang sa 'di byin pa des bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te yongs snad cig/ dab sung chen pos
115b1(1): bde kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung dral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra btso pa yin no snyam mo// 'jam
115b2(1): bu'i ste ma ji lta gar bar sU ru ra'i snye ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi snyan du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi
115b3(1): bsti gnas gan gangan bdero gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung dral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi phan
115b4(1): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyed kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis// 'dir ngas 'od srung khrod song nas
115b5(1): rnying po mngon par mkhyen nas jis thugs mnyam par gsagan/ rlung gi s+thA misan mi gling drug shegs nus/ mamos ma btab pa'i 'bras pa wa'i 'bras ltung ba seng bag nas/ 'dir byin pa des pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa
115b6(1): gas par rnags kyis gas na mongs kyang cag/ rag sa na ci ra tsha 'gas pa/ danas gang rgyas 'dasrung rab pa can jig mdumamapa te/ 'ad nga sa snang can po rdza ma
115b7(1): la ma ma ba kyang ma pa na gamams/ de rgyal ba ba'i dang / tham sa zus pa'i yug shegs dag bdu ma zung bzeng sa sa / 
116a1(1): @brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags chang ching rnga bzhugs so// de nas ldeng rgyas 'od srung rab pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
116a2(1): kyi ched du rang nyid kyis g.yos byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod legs nas mchis na dge sbyong chen po de'i dus la ba ba
116a3(1): par dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs bsnams/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te lteng rgyas de srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na bshams pa der gshegs te byon nas gdan
116a4(1): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ btsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo// / 
116a5(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas// phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das chus chu ba'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // 
116a6(1): de nas lnga rjes kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sal bsnun pa dang // de nas pa'o// 
116a7(1): mchen po zhi khung ste/ chub ba de ba bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu ba'i bra ba mdzad do// deng rgyas 'od srung dral pa can bsgrinas na 'chag pa na bkong ma chen po blangs chu 'bab pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdi skam du
116b1(1): sems te chu 'di ni sngon ni med na chu 'di da ltar gang nas pa bsnyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rnal pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong chen
116b2(1): po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkong ma chen pa'i cha ba cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis nang ltar chu 'di gnas pa bskam
116b3(1): bgyid do// ga 'od srung 'dir khyed las ngas bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa nang la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus
116b4(1): chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag pas la bsnun pa las/ de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba dengs chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de 'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rul
116b5(1): ma can 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul tsho zhing mthu che ba yin te yo mtshan tshe mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi
116b6(1): bsti gnas kyi gnags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed bred nang du yang dag 'dzeg las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na pa der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i
116b7(1): gram gyi mtha' cig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par bzhugs nas skra khrus mdzad nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung par bzhed pa na/ shing ardzu na gang
117a1(1): na ba der logs su phyag rkyang ngo // de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dung bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // 
117a2(1): ngan lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can pa sti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga'i 'di sngon ni 'dud
117a3(1): par ma gyur na/ adzu ni' yal ga chen po 'dis zhig gis 'drang sam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
117a4(1): dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa ni rdzi lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na/ ardzu 'ana'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems
117a5(1): te.ardzu 'ana'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/ nga 'di su zhig gis 'dung snyam bgyid do// 'od srung nga 'dir phyed nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lags pas brkos pa gan pa der gshegs
117a6(1): te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' cig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag te/ rdzing lag pas brkos par bzhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing
117a7(1): ardzu na gang na ba der logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang / de nas mardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di 'dud par gyur te de lar 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // 'od srung 'di ni shing ardzun lag pas bzung ba
117b1(1): zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te// 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// rigs
117b2(1): bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrong ba'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
117b3(1): dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang tu bkru snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag cig las rdole ba che la ring ba zhig blangs
117b4(1): nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phrag dar khrong pa'i sha na'i ras ngag 'di la bkru bar gsol// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
117b5(1): ngar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du bkram snyam pa dang // de rnam nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems
117b6(1): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas za gcig las rdo lepa che la ring ba zhig khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
117b7(1): 'di 'bras dang zod pa'i shana'i ras rnams pakram du gsog/ del bcom ldan 'das kyis phrag da mthong pa mna'i ras dag patham mo// keng rgyas 'ong srung bzhi gnas na 'chags pa na/ rdol ba chal ring bdag mdong ngo / 
118a1(1): @#mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te// rdole ba che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag nga su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs so snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
118a2(1): ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyir nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdole ba che la/ 
118a3(1): ring ba dag cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag ni sngon ma mchis na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te/ mchis snyam bgyid do// 'od srung
118a4(1): 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so// de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang tu bkrus bskam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i
118a5(1): dgongs dang shes nas zag cig la rdo le ba che la ring ba zhig blangs te/ byin nas/ ngal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrong pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol// ngas de la phrag dar
118a6(1): khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang tu bkram snyam pa dang // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis dgongs pa shes nas brag
118a7(1): cig las rdo leb che zhing ring ba gzhan zhig blangs te// ngagangan ba der 'ongs te phyin nas// ngal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dil bya ga dar khrod pa'i shana'i ras rnams bkum dugasos/ ngas dag
118b1(1): bya gdar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo// 'od srung rdo le ba che zhing ring ba de dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu
118b2(1): 'phrul che che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// 
118b3(1): de'i tshe nai rany+dza na'i chu cher 'bru ga nas bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla ga ba med pa la 'chag par mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs
118b4(1): rab pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po 'brug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal lo/ snyam du bsams nas// shing cig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs
118b5(1): te bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa'i bla gab med pa na chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo // mthong nas
118b6(1): kyang bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson nam 'od srung gson no// dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam 'od srung 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di
118b7(1): sum dra dgongs te/ malangs ji skar grags mnyam par gzhagan shing gcig pa'i grwa jis bur chul 'jug pa deg bu'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par 'du bya'o sam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji gar thugs mnyam/ 
119a1(1): par gzhag na shing cig pa'i glu ji lta bar tshul 'jug pa de ltar bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge
119a2(1): spong chen po rdzu 'brul che zhing mthu ba yin te la mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od
119a3(1): srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/ dgra bcom lnga pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te// dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yan yang
119a4(1): mi shes so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis/ bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam tu rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge
119a5(1): sbyong chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyong pa sbyang bar bgyi'o// 'od srung
119a6(1): khyod kyis 'khyod kyi 'khor labaltas sam dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srung de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig/ 'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ bshes gnyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor
119a7(1): labags pa legs pa yin no// de nas geng rgyas lod srung rab pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na bder song sa phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la sbas pa/ bram po'i khye'u dag shes pas gyis shig/ zam de'i ze'u
119b1(1): dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar/ tshangs par spyod pa spyang na/ shes ldan dag ci byed mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni/ mkhan po la brten nas/ lags pas gal te mkhan po
119b2(1): dge slong chen po'i spyan sngar/ tshangs par sbyang pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang bzhi dang shing shun dang 'khar ba dang ril
119b3(1): ba spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung norany+dzana'i nang du 'on cig/ mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang 'khar ba dang zil ba spyi blugs
119b4(1): dang / thugs zar rnams chu klung nairany+dza na'i nang du bor nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po 'di ltar po dag
119b5(1): cag gi bgyi ba gang lags pa bgyid lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
119b6(1): dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge sbyong gi dngos po thob pa blta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs
119b7(1): bar spyod pa spang bar gyi'o// 'od srung chur shog tshangs par srung pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de'i tshe lteng rgyas
120a1(1): 'od srung ral pa can gyi srun chu klung 'od srung dang srung dang / ga ya 'od srung gnyis 'khor gnyis brgya lnga bcu dang chu klung ne reny+dza na'i mjug gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' \u0f7f
120a2(1): spyad do// chu klung 'od srung rang ga ya 'od srung srun gyis g.yang bzhi dang shing shun dang khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang blugs gzar de dag chu krung nai rany+dzan nas khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas
120a3(1): kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po 'am kun po 'am me'am chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag cag gis tshang
120a4(1): pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo// skam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srung dgra ya 'od srung dasun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'tshol zhing ldeng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti
120a5(1): gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ldeng rgyas 'od srung rab can sra phyi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod
120a6(1): do// chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung spun gyis// ldeng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra phyi bsnam sbyar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong
120a7(1): ro// mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// 'od srung 'di mchog yin la/ de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin
120b1(1): de ni ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma
120b2(1): yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas khos gdugs pa ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur bsti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mchod par byas shing
120b3(1): dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang / lan gnyis kyi bar du yang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis/ ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par spyad par bya'o// 
120b4(1): snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la// rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
120b5(1): dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par srung bar bgyi'o// khyed kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srung dag de'i phyir re/ 
120b6(1): shig 'khor la bltos shig/ 'di ltar khyed lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ bshes gnyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung srun rang gi
120b7(1): bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyir nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag na dge slong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyad na/ 
120b8(1): sas ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan pa dag bdag cag cung ma co 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan pa dag la brten nas lags kyis/ gal te mkhan pa dag dge slong chen pa'i spyan sna tshangs par spyad pa srung gi pan cag
121a1(1): mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus nga yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srung dang gal 'od srung srun
121a2(1): 'khor nyis brgya lnga b.ru lnga bcu dang / bco ldan 'das gdon bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen
121a3(1): po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par ldan bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par sbyang par bgyi'o// 
121a4(1): 'od srung dag tshur sheg/ tshangs par sdud par spong cig de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can
121a5(1): stong po de rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na g.yar byon nas g.ya na ga ya'i mgo
121a6(1): mchod rten la sngon gyi rnal pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong song po de la/ che 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de// 
121a7(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun brjod pa'i cho 'phral dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji gar thugs ma
121b1(1): par gzhagun nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi phreng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas slong lam rnam pa bzhis mdzad de/ 'dis sa 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang bzhugs pa
121b2(1): dang / mnal par mdzang / me'i ting nge 'dzin pa yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod su 'aper rnam pasna tshogs
121b3(1): dag 'dran par mdzadzas maldan pa nga bar me dang / dmang ba dang pa ba nga / debartan dang / 'gyi bad ga dag na// tshe 'phrul zung dus ngasun par mdzadzo de/ sla'i tha rnam
121b4(1): 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i song las chu brang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do// sku'i stong na me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i slang nas chu zang mo'i rgun 'bebs par mdzad pa de la bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
121b5(1): bzhugs so// shar phrogs la ji lta ba bzhin du l+le dang / nub dang / byang phrogs su yang de bzhin no/ phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par du mdzad pa rnas
121b6(1): bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dgung la gangan bshams pa nid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i tshe 'phrul ni
121b7(1): 'di yin te/ dge slong dag byed kyi sems ni 'dil bu'o// khyed kyi ying ni 'di lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni 'di la bu'o// 'di ni rtogs shig 'di ni ma rtogs shig/ 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 
122a1(1): / 'di ni yid lam byed cig/ 'di ni spongs shig/ 'di ni ma spangs shig/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par bgyis te mnos shig/ 'di ni
122a2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phral ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dga' di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar bayon no// dge slong
122a3(1): thams cad kun tu 'a bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi reg pa'i rkyen kyis
122a4(1): nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin// sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag rna ba dang sna dang lce dang
122a5(1): lus dang yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba la ma sdug bsngal ba
122a6(1): 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// gang gis kun tu 'bar zhe na 'dod chags kyi me dang zhe sdang gi me
122a7(1): dang gti mug gi mes kun tu'abar/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa ste/ sdig pa
122b1(1): bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o// de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad rab pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de/ 
122b2(1): len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par 'grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das g.yan g.ya'i mgo bo mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcwa ldan
122b3(1): bzag pa zang ba/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa srid pa kun du sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba
122b4(1): shas ga dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba dang / shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu boskal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong
122b5(1): ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na byang ba de bram ze ma mtshan mkhan pang ltas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang
122b6(1): ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba rin po ches bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che
122b7(1): dang / rta rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yin no// del bu stong yang tshang ba rangabyung ba'i bar 'gyur te/ dpa' brtul thong pa/ yan
123a1(1): / lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnon par bsngo ba med// 
123a2(1): cing 'tshe ba med la 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la/ chos dang 'thun zhing sboms par legs par pa pa ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ gal te skra dang kha spre bigs te// 
123a3(1): gos drar smrig bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyu ro na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
123a4(1): 'jig rten du smra rnam par grags par lung bstan to zhes thos so// zos ras kyang ma ga ti'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang ba der song sde phyin nas/ ma ga da'i rgyal po dra za
123a5(1): spangs gzag can snying po la 'di skad ces smas so/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram dang / 
123a6(1): grong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba re bram ze mtshan mkhan rang balhas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te byam par gyur te khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sbar ba'i
123a7(1): rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas/ badran pa blon po rin po cher 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la bu stong yang cher bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas chos dang 'thun
123b1(1): zhing snyoms par legs par pab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ gal te sa dngu 'a smra bregs te yongs su ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du swA/ 
123b2(1): rnams par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so// zhes bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du'o// lce de khrims shig/ lba bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// gang
123b3(1): bdag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo sAl ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser sna'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gor ma bzhin du ste/ gal te/ 
123b4(1): khyim par gyur te/ gal te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong na
123b5(1): bzhin du'o// gal te skra dang kha spu zegs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas ngang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byang bar gyur na/ re bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom sa
123b6(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du smra rnam par grags par 'gyur de lta khums shig/ lba bas gtso bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra shig/ de ni'i
123b7(1): phyir zhen gong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te swA dang kho
124a1(1): spu bregs te gos drar smrig bgos ras rad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byang bar gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag
124a2(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur na/ de'i nyid thos su khas blang bar bya'o// de nas ma ga te'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs cad snying po steng gi bar bzangs
124a3(1): kyi gzhi na 'dug nas/ smon pa'i bzhi lnga smin par byed pa/ kye me bdag gi yul dra 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
124a4(1): zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i
124a5(1): phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang nye bar song ba dang / nges kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos brlabs pa de shes
124a6(1): nas bslab pa bcas shing srab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge slong dag ma ga ta'i/ 
124a7(1): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs car snying po de khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa lnga smon par byed do// kye me'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi stor ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
124b1(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sad rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
124b2(1): bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang nye bar song ba na ngas kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdags
124b3(1): chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing / bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snum mo/ ma ga ta'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba da gcig ljongs rgyu ba na
124b4(1): shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i dogs chu bo skal ldan shing rnga'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang bltas
124b5(1): mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de sA dang kha spu bregs te gos drar smrig bgos nas dad pa yang
124b6(1): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas reg ya na ga ya'i mgo mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral
124b7(1): pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid pa kun tu spor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes
124b8(1): pazla sems shin tu smin par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// zhes thos so thos nas kyang ma ga ta'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste ldugs nas ma ga ti'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs can snying po la
124b9(1): 'di skad ces smras so lha la khyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag bden lha'i yul na rgyu ba la/ shAH rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa bde zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags
125a1(1): par gyu napa na byung ba grangs bananas/ snang ba 'am thegs gas ma pa mas nas dang payang dgapa se nas khyimanas khyim mang / 
125a2(1): ba rab tu byung bar tha med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i brang chum tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ regs nag sa'i mtha' mtshod rnamal ston thams cad ral pa can dugyur pa'i nges nga
125a3(1): cang kyang dgra bcom par zag pa zang pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol pa shagag dang bdagacig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du me/ la de la bkur mi mdzad cig dang / 
125a4(1): de lda na lnga gtso bo bas chos btso bor 'gyur ro// de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gag po sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig la bsngo ba/ kA ye nang rje tshur khye ga bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song song nas kho bo'i
125a5(1): tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bar gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung dmanyam nga ba nyung ngamang tsho'am bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba dang sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par
125a6(1): spyod dam/ zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang gzims
125a7(1): dang bsun spang kyi rkyen sman dang yi byang rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig/ la bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi nges/ mad
