125b1(1): 'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bas mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song sa byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug / 
125b2(1): phrogs gcig tu 'dugs/ bcom ldan 'das la mi nges 'di skad res gsol to// bdun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma gang+gA'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs can snying pos phyag 'tshal na
125b3(1): gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ zhes bya ba nas reg par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du/ bsnyun gsol lags so// kye mi khrod dang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po
125b4(1): bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa ma ga ng+gA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas// 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du na bza' chos ga
125b5(1): dang bsod snyoms dang gzims chadang bsun snang kyi rkyen dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi del
125b6(1): cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas mi nges bco ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // 
126a1(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad la pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kying dgra bcom pa zag bzang ba zhes bya ba nas yang
126a2(1): dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha sag dang babs cig tu/ ma gdu'i ljongs rgyu cing gshegs pa na yul ma gad+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas yang brang gi
126a3(1): tshal na yod pa gangan pa der gshegs so// de nas bco ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas lung brang gi tshal na bzhugs so// ma ga d+hA'i
126a4(1): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes
126a5(1): bya ba'i bar du ste/ ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ma gad+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas lung zang gi tshal na yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ ma gad+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs
126a6(1): par rab gnas yang brang gi tshul na song pan bzhugs so// thos kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ 'khor brgya zag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bal ba dang
126a7(1): bsen pakur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sun sngar song bam reng shing ba'i 'khor ba sa'i nang du 'bying bar gyur te/ nges bsams pa bdag gis las srin can rung bang byas par mgyur
126b1(1): grang zam mo// ma rnams kyis des sbas pa// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las sngon can ma bras mod kyi khyod dang ldan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag btson ran 'dug gis
126b2(1): de gzon cig/ rgyal pos smras pa gal te del nas don no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du bcug go/ yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na dbu rgyan sngo la zug go/ des yang
126b3(1): bsams pa/ bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te/ des na bdag la lhas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo// yang lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal
126b4(1): po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig mtshungs par spyad par gang yin pa de dag thams cad kha cig ni 'dus/ kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha'
126b5(1): byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbyin cig/ rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bkug go// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang zhab 'bring brta pa'i tshogs khri
126b6(1): brgya stong dang / ma gad+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
126b7(1): ga mdzimam badzin pa'i sa'i bar ma pas yongs pamen palas pangs mang pa'anas kyi gapa' ba shugs so/ ma gang+gA'i rgyal pa 'i lungs gathams pa spong bag zig dzi mamanam
127a1(1): bcom ldan 'das mngon pa'i bar de nas/ rgyal po'i mtshanam lnga po se'u ka dang gdugs dang ral gri dang nor bu'i rnga ya ba dang / lamakhra bo rnams pu'o// 
127a2(1): 'dul ba ga gi/ dus bu bzhi pa// bam po bcung chung dgrub// dem pa na'i rgyal po'i bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i rgya nam lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang
127a3(1): na ba der song ste phyin pa dang // bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de rang gi ming nas phyung ste/ lan gsum gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag
127a4(1): ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so// rgyal po lags so// rgyal po de de bzhin te de de bzhin
127a5(1): no// rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ba'i spangs gzugs cin snying po yin no// rgyal po yin no// rgyal po chen po khyed rang gis nacig pa la 'dug shig/ de nas ma gang+gA'i rgyal po bzo srungs
127a6(1): gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ mgo ng+gA'i zabram ze dang khyim bdag kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
127a7(1): gnyis la mgo bas phrag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // kha cig ni bcom pan 'das dang lhan cig mngon tu yang dgang ga per dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pasnga
127b1(1): tshigs byas te/ grogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // 'acig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na bder logs sa thal mo snar ba btung de 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar
127b2(1): phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'ong srung 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge slong chen po
127b3(1): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyad pa la sbyor ngam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sa ma ga d+hA'i bram
127b4(1): ze dang khyim bdag rnams can kyi sems mkhyen nas// tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshigs su bcang ba'i dbyangs kyis dri basmras pa/ lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na/ me spangs nas ni
127b5(1): brtul zhugs 'di dag sbyong / khyod kyis ji ltar me'i mchod spangs pas// don de 'od srung ngal smra bar gyis// lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa// 'di na kha cig zas skom de bzhin no// 'dod pa dag
127b6(1): dang bud med kho na smra/ de dag thabs kyi dri ma rab mthong ste// nges bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsregs blugs min/ khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang // de bzhin ro la yid ni mi dga' na// lnga
127b7(1): min 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid// dga' ba yin nama'o srung dri yis spros// phung po ma mchis ni bci ma mchis// 'dod srung ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis// gzhan gyis mi bkri go
128a1(1): 'bang mchog mthong ste// des bdag mchod sprin mi dga' bsreg blugs min/ go'apang mi nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas// mchod sbyin
128a2(1): rtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis// 'gro snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te// dmus long gyur nas skye shi rjes bzhin mthom// skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa/ 
128a3(1): ga 'phang 'dus ma byas de bzod mthong na// thub pa go'u ta ma rnam par 'dren khyod ni// skye bo phal chen ngon brtson pa de la zhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis
128a4(1): rtogs pa legs rtogs te/ khyed kyis nyes par bsams pa yin// rab tu phyi ba'i chos rnams la// gtso bo gang yin de blangs so// 'od srung 'khor bcas sgo bskyed cig/ de nas
128a5(1): tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la// bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas dzi lur sems mnyam par gzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang gi na mi snang gyur cing // shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la
128a6(1): mngon par 'phags nas/ snod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de// 'di la ste/ 'chag pa dang // 'breng pa dang / 'dug pa dang // nyal ba byed de// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms pa

128b3(1): dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdud te/ bla gos zag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas

129a1(1): da chen po ni spang rgyas 'od myu rab pa ramagyi tshangs pa mung pa la mi swAng bya/ gang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can cing dag stong chen po'i tshangs par stsa
129a2(1): pam sgyang nas pa 'o// de nas brtson ldan 'das kyis ma gad+hA'i rgyas rgyal pa ga'i sbyangs gzugs car gang pi la bka 'bral pa/ rgyal ba chen po gzugs la skye ba yang med/ 'jig mang yod/ 
129a3(1): de'i skye ba dang 'dzag pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal ba chen po nir ba dang 'du shes dang / 'dra bya nga rnam par shes pa la skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang yang / de'i skye ba dang 'jig par yang rigs

129a7(1): cing zangs med pa'i ma dran las dadam pa yan ni zhes smra'o// rgyam pa chen po rigs kyi zas tshor ba da 'dri byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gi bas mi len/ mi 'dzi/ 
129b1(1): lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed na/ tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra so// de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gag
129b2(1): te gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'dra byed dang rna bar shes pa bdag ma yin no/ 'on ba dgagam sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po'am gso ba po 'am/ gang zag
129b3(1): gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu'am/ byed du 'jug pa po'am/ shes pa po'am/ kun nas shes pa po'am slong pa po'am/ kun nas slong ba po'am/ smra ba po'am tshor ba po
129b4(1): 'am/ kun nas tsher ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yong pa ma yin na gang gis de dag der dge ba dang sdig pa'i las byas rnams kyi rnam par smin so
129b5(1): sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de sra zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis mA ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim
129b6(1): bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag ces bya ba'i ni byis pa so so skye bo zos pa dang mi ldan pas brtags pa'i rjes su lhung ba yin te/ 
129b7(1): 'di lta ste bdag ce'am bdag gi med kyi/ dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal 'gag go// skye ba na yang 'du byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa na 'dra byed rnams 'ag
130a1(1): @ga par gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'dra byed kyi rgyud 'jug go// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyung nyid
130a2(1): nga mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'jogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dgangs lnga'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang
130a3(1): skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dang dman pa dang / gya nom pa dang bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzigs so// las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams yang
130a4(1): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la bskur pa 'debs pa dang log par lta/ 
130a5(1): ba yin te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhi ga nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// sems
130a6(1): can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan dag dang yid kyi logs par spyod pa dang ldan 'a phags pa rnams le skur pa mi 'debs sa pa dang yang dag par lta ba yin te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las pa
130a7(1): chos grangs pa'i rgyus/ rlung dang rkyen ngas lus ni gnas pa 'grom po ras kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar mkhyen to dge slong dgangs de gar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs
130b1(1): bas da 'di skad ces ba dgags sems can nam srog ga ma skye ba po'am/ gza pa po'am gang zag gam/ sheng skyes skyem+ba sheng bu'am byed pa po'am bred du 'jug pa po'am/ shes pa po'am kun nas
130b2(1): shes pa po'am spong ba po'am kun nas spong ba po 'am/ sme ba po'am tshor ba po'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa ni nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / da ltar yang yod pa yin pas gang
130b3(1): gis de dang der dge ba dang sdig pa'i las byas sa pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te/ phung po gzhan dang nying 'tshams sbyor ba de chos su/ brdar btags
130b4(1): pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes mi gsung ngo // de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di yod// 'di skyes pas 'di skye ste/ 'di lta ste ma rig
130b5(1): pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg
130b6(1): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa sreng pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang
130b7(1): sdug bsngal ba dang ying mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de lar na sug bsngal gyi brang po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dis ze 'ang med pas 'di med la/ 'di
131a1(1): cur+ya// 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ 
131a2(1): ming dang gzugs 'gag pas skye bached drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gag pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gag pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gag pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gag pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gag pas srid
131a3(1): pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gag pas rga zhi 'gag rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre bsngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal phung chen po 'bal
131a4(1): shig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// mya ngan 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ning rgya 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gag pa ste/ rgyun bcad pas mi byung
131a5(1): cid tshangs sbyor ba med par 'gags pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi yin no// dge slong dag de la yongs su bya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gnan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi bar/ de ni bsil bar gyur pa/ 
131a6(1): de ni nub pa ste/ dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste phung po thams cad spangs pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i
131a7(1): rgyal po gab sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal ba/ rgyal bachen po snya ma du sems/ gzugs rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa mi rtag lags sa// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug
131b1(1): ga rdzu ba men/ btsun pa 'ang bsngal legs sa// seMs bcug bsngal bar 'gyur ba mas sa gang 'anapa mam pa kyimamam thas pa dang rdzupa/ 'a

131b3(1): ci yang rung 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'ang/ da ltar 'byung ba'am/ nang ge'am/ byi'am/ rags pa'am tha ba'am/ ngan pa'am kyirnam pa'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/ 
131b4(1): ngag zags pa yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'don ba dag sa yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin do// 'di ni bdag gi bdag pa yin da nas de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du bral bar byag / rgyal ba chen po na

132a2(1): 'am/ nang gi'am byi'i 'am/ rags pa'am phra ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ ma nom pa'am/ gang dag thag ring ba'am/ gang dag zag nye bayang rung ste/ de ga thams cad la 'di ni bangadag ma yin no/ 
132a3(1): bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no// zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po la phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan

132a7(1): dum la ches rnams sa ches kyi mas rdul mang cing drim dang bral ba skyes pa/ nganas ma ga du'i rgyal po la srungs gzugs can snying bas chos mthong ba dang chos thob pa dang chos kyi'i gaming
132b1(1): chos gter skabs pa dang / chom rnams rgas pa dang / tsam las rgal ba dang / gan pordza sa 'jog pa dang / gas gyis mi kri ba dang / kun pas bstan pa'i tshus rnas lami 'jig pa zog
132b2(1): nas/ san las langs te thago phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der logs sa thal mo sbyar ba btung de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags/

137a1(1): byin pas rgyal sring breng 'di dga' byin no// blon pos rnams kyis smras pa/ la ba 'di dag ni drang 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba lags pas/ rgyal srid kyi phyed 'di dgal cib gyi/ 
137a2(1): 'di dag lo dma'i tshal gang du gnas pa der 'di dag gi gnas bca'o// rgyal pos smras pa de bzhin du bgyis shig/ skyed mo tshal de'o dma'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor te/ blon po rnams kyis de rnams kyi gnas 'od

142a7(1): grub pa yang rgyal ba'i khab tu gnas par byed ngam zhes zeng na/ me grags so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal tegang du gnas par byed nas 'drin dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag 'ang durje

149a2(1): dpa' bo legs// khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis// ji lta bur yang ma gos so// de nas rab dga' dang pa rgyas byas nas// drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni// thub pa'i zhabs

149a7(1): shes na/ bdag kyis kyang 'jig nin thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig/ del shakya rnams kyis gshegs pa'i tshig gis su smras pa// gsun bcom ldan 'das ni rje 'bral che ba mtho che ba yin gyis/ 
149b1(1): deskad pa smra shig ces bzlog nas// cing rmi smra bar 'dug go// mangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'dil bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de// de thos pas rgyal po bas gtsang ma gtogs par
149b2(1): bre ba bas la sobs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'azas bu mngon sum du byas pa nas// yang lnga sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro// ro ha ka'i skyed mos tshal du 'di la bu'i chos bshad/ 
149b3(1): pa mdzad de// de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na// lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du

150a2(1): bo sgra mchog dam chos kyi// charabs 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad do/ mi bzong lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di// drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod// rgyal po 'di snyam du// bdag gi bu 'ba'
150a3(1): zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di yar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste// lhag par dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa// rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bder ba ma

155a1(1): 'gyur sbar pa las/ des bsams pa shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/ des shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa
155a2(1): rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ltar gzhon du don thams cad grub pa
155a3(1): bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig/ ci thams cad dam// khyim re re nas re re'o// bka' bzhin

155a7(1): las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na khyod rab du byung shig/ des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi byung gis/ khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu byung
155b1(1): shig/ bsod nams kyi dbang zang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma 'tshol cig/ yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de sod nams kyi dbang thang can lags tshang/ de ring de la cung zad kyang ma spyan dang / 
155b2(1): jo bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sa pa/ ba lags mngon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byas te/ yid ches par bya'o// des gzeb spong ba rjes lus gis btang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya stegs la rgyas btab nas/ 
155b3(1): bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur zhes bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang ces ji yang ma mchis so zhes smos shig/ des de khyer nas song ba dang / de lha rnam kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni no/ 
155b4(1): tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shes pa bsod snyom phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i zas kyis 'phongs par bya/ de'i gzan sbyar bar bya'o zhes/ des rje'u de rnams sran tshon dang / 
155b5(1): tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang / zas kyis bkang ngo // ji tsam na ma dag gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang / des smras pa/ bu mo 'o na ni ci yod des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang
155b6(1): ma mchis so// ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o// zhes ji tsam na
155b7(1): kha phye ba dang / skyed pos tshal de tham cad pas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de bsnams nas ma 'gag pa mchog tu mtshan skye'o// de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas sbyin pa/ 
156a1(1): sum gdugs tshong rere zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di la bu dag bskur ba'i rigs so// des kyang mthong nas mchog tu la mtshan skyes te/ des ming cen pa
156a2(1): rang bstan nas/ bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags so// khrod la kho bos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can mi'i skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/ des smras pa/

156a4(1): des ma 'gags pa la smos pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrog tu bdug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rag rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na khyod ci rab tu byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug/ des smras pa/ 
156a5(1): yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ khyim par gyur pa la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung bas legs par basmra bas na/ mya ngan las 'dra

157a1(1): \u0f7f/ bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig/ de de nyid du gnas btab bo// ma' chabs rims bag gi dri can gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram

162a6(1): su zhig dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems shes bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i sa phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des de mthong ba dang / sngon gyi bya ba drin tu gzo bas yid bde ba skye
162a7(1): nas sbas pa/ zam po'i bu'i seng sa shi du rim pa'i mi ti gang gzer teshog shig/ bdag cag ldan cig dga' mgur spong bar bya'o// re shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyang ngo mnar
162b1(1): gyis bsdus nas song ngo // de'i gzugs dang lang tsho dang / g.yer ba'i yon tan la brtags na mos shing shin pas mtshan thos thag ga nyid ma lob pa/ namanangs pa dang / mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin tu
162b2(1): lci bar gyur nas/ ji tsam 'i ma shar gyi bar duganying log nas/ gang gi che 'jig rten gyi dus son gyi cheng du me tog thams cad bkrus zin pa de'i ches nganas matog gi cheng dadu bam chun song ba na/ ma rnyeng nas des
162b3(1): shing shi ri sha zhes bya ba'i me tog dag khyer nas de'i drung du song sa tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ g.yang gzhi thogs pa bu mo mdzes dga' ni// ma sha phyed med sbyang gzhan snyoms las kyis// de ring shi
162b4(1): rnams me tog rgyas dus 'ang// sbyin pa'i me tog shir sha 'di yin no// de smras pa/ song la me tog gzhan dag khyer te shog shig/ 'dod pa rnams la so sor ston par byed pa ni/ kun tu sbyor ba sdog
162b5(1): tede'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma'i nyin pa' bar smin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus na/ grong khyer nas shin tu thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dag tu mgo 'dren pa dang
162b6(1): dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len cing me tog zu'o// rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dgas 'chor drangs pa ni nga nyi ma'i zer rnon pos gdungs nas/ grib ma'i tshang du phyogs der son pa na/ de'i glus thos nas tshig
162b7(1): su pa chang nas sbas pa/ seng nas nim gdung byed cing // 'o gnas byems gdungs pa la// gru le ma byed kyi lus la ni// de phyir nyi ma'i gdung ba med/ mdzes dgas kyang tshigs su bsang de smras pa/ 
162'a1(1): ba de'i tshe ba skra rnams drung rlung pras sa la skyugs par gyur to// de 'di snyam du dgrongs lam 'di yang shes par nus ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ blun
162'a2(1): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo// de nas lha gsum zhig byang chub sems dpa' ga na ba der lpags ste/ de na gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so// / 
162'a3(1): dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nag po zhig go// gnyis pas 'di skad ces smras so// 'di nag po ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngo bsangs shig go// gsum pas 'di skad ces smras so// 'ang
162'a4(1): 'di nag po yang ma yin gyi/ sngo bsangs kyang ma yin gyi mdog dmar smag gcig go// byang chub sems dpa' sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad nub par
162'a5(1): gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhig snang ba 'di lta ste/ shing rlon pa can chu can zhig nas phyung ste nye bar skam gzhag pa dang / 
162'a6(1): de nas mi mengon du gnyer ba mo 'tshal ba zhig der 'ongs nas/ des de la mdzub ston byas te/ gtsub cing gzhag nas gtsubs nas/ 'di ltar shing deng rlon pa chu can yin pa'i
162'a7(1): phyir mi 'byung ba dang 'bar du ma btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong bram ze kha gcig 'dor pa rnams la lus dang sem sems kyis thag slor ma gnas kyi/ de rnams kyis 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 
162'b1(1): 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa chums pa dang / 'dod pa la lhag pa'i zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa yin
162'b2(1): bas lus dang sems thag ring bar mi gnas pa rnams kyi ni de dang 'dra'o// de nas bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad bcu brab tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su
162'b3(1): myong mod kyi 'on de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bar nus pa ma yin te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chu sems dpa' la
162'b4(1): sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba dang po yin no// dper na shing rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas phyung ste/ nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang / de nas mi me don du nye bar me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas
162'b5(1): des de la mdzub bstan byas te/ btsub shing bzhig nas bcu pa nas 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can pa'i phyir me byung ba dang 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha gcig 'dod pa
162'b6(1): rnams la lus kyis par gnas kyi sems kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la 'chags pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 
162'b7(1): 'dod pa la chums pa dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa yin no// de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi rang
163a1(1): @#bdag ni nyi mas ma gadrangs te// rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs lags// bya ba bya ba ma yin pas// 'jig rten 'dir gdungs nyi ma min// rgyal pos bsams
163a2(1): pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te// des na nyi ma bre ce 'dug nas me tog zu'o snyam nas/ des de bkug te smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re shig bsil
163a3(1): bar byed pa'i gtam dag byos shig mnyan to// des bsams pa/ rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa yin te// des na 'di skad smra'o// snyam nas/ des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tsheg
163a4(1): de la smras pa/ thos nas rgyal po lus kyi gdud pa dang bral bar gyur to// rgyal po mngon par dga' bar gyur nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sreg sbyin
163a5(1): pa gang yin la lan du pan cing gdags la rgyal srid phyed kyis so// de nas rgyal po des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob shig dang / sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin no// de'i rgyal
163a6(1): mo'i pho brang du mal bzang po byin nas/ de la nyal ba na bzang mo rjes su dran par sems shing rgyal srid phyed po de yang smad tshong ma bzang mo'i phyir blang ngo sbas mo// yang bsams pa rgyal srid byed po de la longs spyod ba'i
163a7(1): rgyal po de ji 'dra bzhig/ mal bdag gis de sog dang bral bar bya'o snyam mo// yang bsams pa/ rgyal po bsang pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya snyam nas tshigs su bcad de spras pa// donam
163b1(1): grub na 'dod 'gyur la// don grub 'dod pa ldog mi 'gyur// ma grub na ni phongs gyur pas// de bas don ni don ma yin// ji tsam nam lengs su nye ba na// de 'gyod pa skyes na ma la nA ba bteg yang gzhis la
163b2(1): bting nas nyal lo// nam langs pa na rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u de khug shig/ de la rgyal srid phreng byin no// rgyal po'i pho nya dag 'ongs pa na mal chen po nas babs te/ g.yang
163b3(1): shi sa la bting nas nyal ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ma dad pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i gan du dong nas smras pa/ lha 'di ni rgyal srid kyi 'os ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir de rnams kyis
163b4(1): smras pa/ lnga nyon mongs pa chen po gnom pa spangs pa ste/ ga yang gzhi sa la bting nas mchis/ nyal ba'i dman pa la mos pa gang lags pa de la rgyal sring stsal te ci rung / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan
163b5(1): dag shes rab can te/ de la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur gyis khug shig de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze'i khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal chen po nas babs te ga yang gzhi sa la
163b6(1): bting nas nyal/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas nas de nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig dang / rab tu byung ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ dam zhig
163b7(1): bca' ste gal te khyod rab tu byung nas/ khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs par la brjod pa ldan gnang ngo // des de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes khas blangaso/ de nas des zhi ba'i
164a1(1): / phyogs su phyin nas/ mkhan po dang slob dpon med par/ rang byang chub rtogs par byas nas/ rang sangs rgyas nges bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal po de la sngon khas
164a2(1): blangs pa song ga khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o zhes de rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ seng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so/ 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / 
164a3(1): klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ dge ba ci zhes btsal phyir rab byung ba'i// bram ze'i khye'us
164a4(1): rnyeng pa legs rnyed de// cung zad las kyi rnam smin skyed pa'i// nyer 'gros khyad par chen po 'dir rtogs ltos// rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi sgo mkhan gang 'ga' skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de des
164a5(1): mdzes dgas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ 'dzin tu bcug nas smras pa/ gang ga skyong nga la tshigs su bcad pa de yang dang yang du dran par gyis shig/ sgra mkhan gang ga skyong rang gyi gzol shin tu
164a6(1): byang ba yin pas// de gang gi tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi kha su 'chos pa de'i tshe/ de gnyid log par 'gyur zhing se gol gyis sang par byas te/ sang nas kyang gang 'ga' song la mchog gang 'dod pa
164a7(1): gsal cig ces mchog smin par byed pa na/ des sbas pa/ lha gsol pa zhig mchis so/ gang gi gang gasbyong gis rgyal pa la tshigs su gnang ba/ dran par byed pa de'i tshe/ rgal po'i dang
164b1(1): pa'i gtam la sems kyang mi 'gro na// 'dod pa zhen cing spyod pa la smos kyang ci dgos te btsun mo la lta bar yang mi byed do// btsun mo rnams nyon mongs pas myos shing zhen nas gang ga skyong la
164b2(1): smras pa/ gang po gang gi tshe khyod la lhas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ lha gal te bdag la dgyes na/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don rgyas par bshad dro gsol zhes gsol cig/ rgyal
164b3(1): pos tshigs su bcad pa de'i don rgyas par rnam par grol ba dang / de skyo ba skyes nas rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags kyis/ khyims nas khyim mchis par rab
164b4(1): tu byung ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te rab tu byung nas yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rnyed nas nga la rig par byos shig/ des sbas pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bstan tu gsol par bgyi'o// 
164b5(1): de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song se rab tu byung nas/ des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// de 'ad snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin la sngon khas blangs kyis song
164b6(1): la khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o// snyam nas/ de rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa te 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa
164b7(1): klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo na rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtong ba yin pas/ des rkang pa la gtugs te/ smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis
165a1(1): yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/ rtogs so// rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis drang srong gang ga sbyong gi rkang pa la gtug pa nas rnam pa drug g.yos
165a2(1): par gyur to// yang de'i mas tshig su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs sbyin blo dang ldan pa'o// 'di ru 'dreg mkhan la ca dag/ gzhan nas rab tu byung 'di la/ lA khyod
165a3(1): 'dud pa tshul ma yin/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi mas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcang bas smras pa// 'di ltar slab pa'i thub pa'i gzhi rnams la/ des ni dka'
165a4(1): spyad 'di dag spyad lags ste/ blo rgya chen por gyur pa gang lags pa/ gong ga skyong la cung zad ma gzung shig/ dka' thub zil gyis sdig pa thams cad mnan/ dka'
165a5(1): thub zil gyis 'jig rten thams cad mnan/ dka' thub zil gyis dreg mkhan snod bcom ste/ dka' thub zil gyis drag mkhan snod bcom ste/ dka' thub 'ab ra la
165a6(1): cung zad ma gsungs shig/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa 'di nyid yin ro/ drang srong gang
165a7(1): gang ga sbyor zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ nye bar 'khor 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan tshangs sbyin du gyur bi na/ nye bar 'khor slong gang
165b1(1): ga sbyong zhes bya bar gyur pa la phyag byas pa nas rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// da ltar yang bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor rab tu phyung ba phyag byas pa na// sa
165b2(1): rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// sdom la/ kau di n+ya dang ril ba'i dbyibs/ thams cad sgrol nor shing rta dang / gdugs dang srin ki ta rtsa/ byams pa'i dril sgrog
165b3(1): bcu pa dang / dga' skyong la du bdung ba dang / snum khur gnas 'jog spang rtsi can/ 'dul ba 'dzin mchog bgrangs pa'o// gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
165b4(1): ru tI n+yas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi chog tu bstan pa
165b5(1): de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams the mchom skyes te// the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa che dang ldan pa kun shes kau di n+yas
165b6(1): las ji zhig bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
165b7(1): stsal pa/ dge slong dag kun shes ke'ung gyi 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyeng ba/ rkyen yongs su sbyar po/ 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar
166a1(1): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing brtsugs pas/ dge slong kau din+ya 'di nyid kyis las byas ning bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor
166a2(1): myong bar gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur
166a3(1): rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba la byas shing bsags pa dag ni gzin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams
166a4(1): bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chung mi za ba 'di 'ang tshogs dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po yi
166a5(1): 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ba'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
166a6(1): mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dron bza' sham thabs bsnams/ chos gos dang lhung bzed
166a7(1): bsdams te/ wa re Na sir bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / dge 'dun lnga brgya tsam dong ba'i dge 'dun de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
166a8(1): sangs rgyas mam ldan 'dis 'ang srung shes bya ba byu na/ de thong zer wA ra Ni si nye bar bstadan nas ri la ril pa'i dbyi mo zhes bya ba la 'atsugs so// ji tsam dus na ni na
166b1(1): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ sru dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin pa
166b2(1): che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu dad pa skyed nas// gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di las rab tu byung bar bya'o zhes
166b3(1): de rnams kyis de ltar bgros byas pa las/ kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// kha cig ni yul gyi mthar dong ngo // kha cig ni shi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur te// skye bo
166b4(1): bcu drugacig lus pa de rnams de ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab tu bar tu byung ste/ de rnams de na bsams gtan
166b5(1): dang klog pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi gnas so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shing
166b6(1): zad pa'i me bzhin du drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags su phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las sgo// de rnams la lha rnams kyis smras
166b7(1): bi/ shes ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas da ring du zhag bdud lon te/ da'i bas pa
167a1(1): mang nu na/ khyed drug 'bras bu med pa'i spyad pa 'bru'i zhing 'dug ste/ ci rlung zhes byas bzlas nas/ bya ba ma byas pa'i sdug bsngal chen thos gdung
167a2(1): so// de nas lnga ni thos ma thag tu ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs las babs nas// wA ra Na sir zhugs so// drug gis ni de nyid du yid byung bas brtsams nas/ rang byang chub mngon
167a3(1): sum du byas so/ byinas lnga lang 'babs nas// wA ra NA sa nyid du 'jug par brtsams pa na/ ji tsam na shing rngas 'tsho ba'i tshong ba dag 'gro ba na/ shing rta 'tsho ba gcig
167a4(1): gi glang dag nyam chung ba bzhin du de dag la res lcags gzer bu can gyis lang nas yang du bzhus te/ de rnams nyams chung bas shi la thug cing 'gro mi bzhin du/ shing rta 'tshog
167a5(1): de/ shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong ba'i snang la 'gro ba dang de la/ dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye shing rtas 'tsho ba khyod kyis glang nyam chung ba 'di rnams la/ lcags gzer
167a6(1): bu can gyis yang nas yang du gzhus te ci rung / gal te 'gro mi nus na del bus 'gror chug la/ phyi nas song ngo // cho ga des smras pa/ bdag sna la shing rngas 'tsho ba'i tshong
167a7(1): ba dang / lhan cig mchi mi nus zhe na/ gal te bdag phyi nas chas na gdon mi za bar shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa 'dis bdag por nas dong bar gyur to// de rnams kyis shing
167b1(1): rngas 'tsho ba de las zur bzung nas mi dga' ste gcig la gcig smras pa/ shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ bdag
167b2(1): cag lus na 'dis kyang bdag cag skul ma tab kyis/ mal bdag cag gis brtson 'grus brtsums par bya'o zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thub pa
167b3(1): chen po 'od srung gi/ gal te chos ni nub gyur kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i rtson 'grus 'dor bar mi bya'o// bdag cag gi ni zag pa yang / gal te
167b4(1): zad par ma gyur na// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yin// nyan thos mchog tu 'gyur bar bya// de rnams wA ra NA sir zhugs nas// bsod snyoms spyad de// slar yang ri bo ril
167b5(1): dbyibs la dong nas bsam gtan klag pa dang / rnal 'byor gyis gnas pa dang / de rnams las bzhi shi'o// gcig cig lus pa de mi dga' ba skyes shing yid byung bas ched du
167b6(1): brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang yin pa 'di nyid la bdag gis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byis la de'i dang
167b7(1): srong gi'i yang mthing na bdag 'ba' zhig 'jam bu gling mtha' dag na snga ma sbyar gyi rgyal chen 'dzin pa lta zhig snyam nas/ nges slor lami gtab par brtsams pa 'di ltar
168a1(1): bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la 'di srid du tshangs par skyong ba smad na/ yon tan gyis tshogs cung zad zad
168a2(1): kyang ma rtogs kyis// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la/ bram ze'i khye'u
168a3(1): khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs shAkya thub par 'gyur ro// zhes lung ston pa de'i bstan pa la
168a4(1): yang dag par rab tu byung nas/ der thogs mar nyon mong ba thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des bdag
168a5(1): snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lang dag par rdzogs pa'i
168a6(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong nyi khri lod pa las dge slong cig lus pa las 'jam bu gling mtha' dag na/ snam
168a7(1): gyad kyi rgyal mtshan bzung ste// ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang na ba der song nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong kun shes kau di r+ya 'di nyid yin te/ 
168b1(1): smod lam gyi dbang gis da ltar lang bcom lnga 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bsnun pa'o// dge slong dag de lnga bas na/ las gcig tu
168b2(1): gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin lo/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyis rnam par srid pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi
168b3(1): 'dren ma yin pas/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams ni sbyangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya sa
168b4(1): dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bu la bslab par bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ko diN+Dal chos bshad nas/ yang nas yang du rmeng ba ma
168b5(1): de/ kau din+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal legs so// kau di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kun 'cha
168b6(1): lags so// zhes bsol ba de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa che dang ldan pa
168b7(1): kun shes ko ri rgyam las kyi zhig bgyis na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad pa nas/ yang nas yang du rmad pa mdzad de/ gode khyod kyis chos kun shes
169a1(1): sa ma/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lhags so// kau mkhyod kyis chos kun shes so/ bde bar gshegs ma// zhes gsol lags/ bcom
169a2(1): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gau di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing gsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras
169a3(1): bur 'gyur/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer wA ra NA sir rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde bar

169a5(1): dgu' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lA na sdug pa yan lag

169a7(1): rnams kyis smras pa ga bu'i dbus kyi bul ches kyis ni gzugs pamang zhing mdzes ladang bltan sug po legs na/ de mangs dga' zhes 'dogs so/ khye'u 'di yang
169b1(1): ma brgyad po pad+ma na 'tshon mamana'i snadun num bsdun pa ma ma gtsang dang / brim gyi bamam ma gnas ngas rgya thugs kyim ldag sa/ ma mra bcwa pa la rjes su gtad nas/ da ma mA
169b2(1): gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug cing yul ka shi rgyal po'i sras kyang lags pas/ khye'u'i ming ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes de'i ming
169b3(1): ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bya bar btags so// khye'u ka shi mdzes dga' ma brgyad kyis ngo ma dang zho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang
169b4(1): yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis spring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du skyed par byed do// yang rgyal po rtse bar byed dga' bar byed pa
169b5(1): dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ btsun mo ga sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon po na/ khye'u zhig btsas te/ gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid
169b6(1): kyi nyi ma la wA ra N+Da sir yul mi dang grong mir thab mo chen po byung ngo // de btsas pa'i btsas sngon rgya chen po byung ngo // de btsas ston rgya chen byas nas/ khye'u'i ming
169b7(1): TIr gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// btsun mo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ lha 'di bcas pa na wA ra NA sir grong mi dang yul mi rnams thab mo chen po byung bas

170a1(1): chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag kyang yab 'das na rgyal por 'gyur/ zhing
170a2(1): bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas/ rgyal srid byed du bcug nas/ dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur

170a4(1): gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par byed/ sbyin sreg sreg par byed/ dka' thub kyi gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs na ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung

170a7(1): shes par gyis shig/ khyod ri nga'i bu cig pa sdug pa ling du 'ong ba/ bzod pa mi mthun pa yod pa yin te/ nga shi bar gyur na/ mi 'dod bzhin du khyod dang thal grang /
